analyzed: gang dag spyi mthong zhing gzung ba po yang rten ma bzung ba po dang mtshungs shing 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the universal is seen, the apprehender would be the same as the non-apprehender, the basis.

original: gal te rten gcig bzung bas kyang thams cad gzung ba yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te rten gcig bzung bas kyang thams cad gzung ba yin na ni /
translated: If by apprehending one basis, all are apprehended,

original: de yang rten bzhin du du mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang rten bzhin du du mar 'gyur ro //
translated: then that would be multiple, like the basis.

original: 'di ltar yang rjes su dpag par bya ba ni cha shas cung zad tsam las rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang rjes su dpag par bya ba ni cha shas cung zad tsam las rtogs par bya ste /
translated: In this way, the object of inference is understood from just a small part.

original: cha shas 'di lta bu'i tshul nas /
analyzed: cha shas 'di lta bu'i tshul nas /
translated: In this way,

original: rtags can la ni mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: rtags can la ni mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: the sign does not apply to the possessor of the sign,

original: de nyid kyi chos du ma na'ang //
analyzed: de nyid kyi chos du ma na'ang //
translated: and even if the property of that is multiple,

original: cig shos thob par byed pa yin //
analyzed: cig shos thob par byed pa yin //
translated: it causes the attainment of the other.

original: dud pa ni cha shas 'ba' zhig me las mi 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: dud pa ni cha shas 'ba' zhig me las mi 'khrul ba yin no //
translated: Smoke is merely a part that is non-erroneous with respect to fire.

original: dud pa nyid dang skya bo nyid la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: dud pa nyid dang skya bo nyid la sogs pa ni /
translated: Smokiness and paleness, etc.

original: de nyid thob par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid thob par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: cause the attainment of that itself,

original: rdzas nyid la sogs pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas nyid la sogs pas ni ma yin te /
translated: but not by substantiality, etc.,

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of error.

original: yang brjod pa rtags can gang rjes 'brel pa yi //
analyzed: yang brjod pa rtags can gang rjes 'brel pa yi //
translated: Again, it is said: The sign is that which is related to the possessor of the sign.

original: rtags can de 'dir rtogs bya yin //
analyzed: rtags can de 'dir rtogs bya yin //
translated: The character is what is to be understood here.

original: bye brag rtogs bya ma yin te //
analyzed: bye brag rtogs bya ma yin te //
translated: The particulars are not to be understood,

original: de dag nyid las 'khrul phyir ro //üîΩrtags can rjes su 'brel pa'i don //
analyzed: de dag nyid las 'khrul phyir ro // rtags can rjes su 'brel pa'i don //
translated: because of confusion about them.üîΩThe meaning of the relation of the character is

original: rtogs bya rtags can gyi bye brag / ma yin de la rtogs pa po'i //
analyzed: rtogs bya rtags can gyi bye brag / ma yin de la rtogs pa po'i //
translated: the particulars of the character that is to be understood,

original: rtogs pa rab tu 'khrul pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtogs pa rab tu 'khrul pa'i phyir //
translated: because the understanding of the one who understands is confused.

original: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses in the interstices.

original: ci ste 'brel pa ni yang dag par 'phrod pa bzhin du gnyis ka dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir rtags can gyi chos rtags la yang 'gyur ro zhe @31b na ;
analyzed: ci ste 'brel pa ni yang dag par 'phrod pa bzhin du gnyis ka dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir rtags can gyi chos rtags la yang 'gyur ro zhe @31b na ;
translated: But if the relation is like a correct conjunction, it is related to both, so the property of the character would be in the evidence.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te //
translated: That is not so,

original: 'brel pa gnyis las gnas mod kyang //
analyzed: 'brel pa gnyis las gnas mod kyang //
translated: because although it abides in two relations,

original: rtags dang rtags can stobs gcig pa //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can stobs gcig pa //
translated: the evidence and the character are one power,

original: rten dang brten pa bzhin yin gyi //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa bzhin yin gyi //
translated: like the supported and the support,

original: yang dag 'phrod pa bzhin ma yin //
analyzed: yang dag 'phrod pa bzhin ma yin //
translated: but not like a correct conjunction.

original: 'brel pa gnyis la gnas par bden mod kyis kyang 'brel pa tsam gyis rten dang brten pa'i chos su 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'brel pa gnyis la gnas par bden mod kyis kyang 'brel pa tsam gyis rten dang brten pa'i chos su 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Although it is true that the two are related, it is not the case that the mere relation of the two makes them the related and the supporting phenomena.

original: brten pa rten can gyi chos dang thun mong du 'gyur ba ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brten pa rten can gyi chos dang thun mong du 'gyur ba ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it the case that the supporting phenomenon is common to the related phenomenon.

original: de bzhin du rtags rtags can du 'gyur ba'am ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rtags rtags can du 'gyur ba'am ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, it is not the case that the sign is the sign-bearer,

original: gzhan du rtags dang rtags can 'gyur ba ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du rtags dang rtags can 'gyur ba ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: nor is it the case that the sign-bearer is the sign.

original: yang dag par 'phrod pa na ji ltar gcig dang 'brel pa de kho na ltar gnyis pa dang yang ste /
analyzed: yang dag par 'phrod pa na ji ltar gcig dang 'brel pa de kho na ltar gnyis pa dang yang ste /
translated: When they are in contact, just as the one is related, so is the other.

original: de'i phyir de dang 'di ni mtshungs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dang 'di ni mtshungs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not the same as that.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / rtags dang rtags can yod pa nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rtags dang rtags can yod pa nyid //
translated: The existence of the sign

original: cig shos rtags can nyid la yod //
analyzed: cig shos rtags can nyid la yod //
translated: is in the sign-bearer.üîΩThe existence of the sign-bearer

original: rtags dang rtags can dag 'brel pa'i //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can dag 'brel pa'i //
translated: is in the relation of the sign and the sign-bearer.

original: rjes dpag bzlog nas gnas pa yin //
analyzed: rjes dpag bzlog nas gnas pa yin //
translated: Inference is reversed and remains.

original: de'i phyir na rtags can ni rtags la yod pa nyid do zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir na rtags can ni rtags la yod pa nyid do zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the sign-bearer exists in the sign.

original: gang me kho na la yod pa'i du ba'i rdzas nyid la sogs pa yang go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gang me kho na la yod pa'i du ba'i rdzas nyid la sogs pa yang go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: The substance of smoke, which exists only in fire, is also the indicator.

original: gsal ba dang rno ba la sogs pa ni go ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtags rtags can nyid du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba dang rno ba la sogs pa ni go ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtags rtags can nyid du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But since the clarity, sharpness, etc. are not the indicator, the reason and the property to be established do not exist.

original: de'i phyir gzhan du ni rigs pa ma yin pas gang du ba nyid bzhin du ba'i skya bo la sogs pa yang go bar byed pa min zhing rdzas nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan du ni rigs pa ma yin pas gang du ba nyid bzhin du ba'i skya bo la sogs pa yang go bar byed pa min zhing rdzas nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, since it is not reasonable to be otherwise, the smoke itself, like the white smoke, etc. is not the indicator, but the substance, etc. are.

original: de ltar rtags dang rtags can du 'brel ba'i nges par bzung ba ni phyin ci log tu gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rtags dang rtags can du 'brel ba'i nges par bzung ba ni phyin ci log tu gnas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the determination of the relation between the reason and the property to be established is established in the opposite way.

original: ci ste yang rtags yin yang rtags can du 'gyur ba ni dper na byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang rtags yin yang rtags can du 'gyur ba ni dper na byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid lta bu zhe na /
translated: But if it is argued that even though it is the reason, it becomes the property to be established, like the impermanence of what is produced,

original: rtags kyi khyab pa'ang 'dod pa ste //üîΩde yi cha nas rtags can yin //
analyzed: rtags kyi khyab pa'ang 'dod pa ste // de yi cha nas rtags can yin //
translated: the pervasion by the reason is accepted.üîΩFrom that part, it is the property to be established.

original: khyab byed cha nas de go byed //
analyzed: khyab byed cha nas de go byed //
translated: From the part of the pervaded, it is the indicator.

original: ma yin ba lang rva can bzhin //
analyzed: ma yin ba lang rva can bzhin //
translated: Not like the non-existent cow's horn.

original: gang cung zad tsam nas rtags rtags can du 'gyur ba ni yod mod kyis kyang /
analyzed: gang cung zad tsam nas rtags rtags can du 'gyur ba ni yod mod kyis kyang /
translated: There are some who become a signifier of a signifier with just a little bit.üîΩ

original: des de la khyab pa'i tshul gyis rtags kyi yan lag tu 'gro ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des de la khyab pa'i tshul gyis rtags kyi yan lag tu 'gro ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Although there is a slight pervasion of the reason by the property of the thesis, it does not become a part of the reason by the mode of that pervasion.

original: dper na rva can nyid kyis ba lang la khyab kyang des ba lang go bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi khyab byed de nyid ba lang gis go bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rva can nyid kyis ba lang la khyab kyang des ba lang go bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi khyab byed de nyid ba lang gis go bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, although the presence of horns pervades the cow, it does not make the cow understood; rather, the pervaded cow itself makes the cow understood.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: so sor bkag pa'i mi 'khrul @32a * //üîΩba ; / gang phyir 'brel pa la ltos yin //
analyzed: so sor bkag pa'i mi 'khrul @32a * // ba ; / gang phyir 'brel pa la ltos yin //
translated: Because the non-erroneous exclusion of eachüîΩdepends on the relation.

original: de phyir rtags kyi rtags can la //
analyzed: de phyir rtags kyi rtags can la //
translated: Therefore, in the case of the reason and the property of the thesis,

original: khyad pa bden yang byed po min //
analyzed: khyad pa bden yang byed po min //
translated: although there is a real difference, it is not a maker.

original: byas pas mi rtag pa la khyab tu zin kyang rtag pa nyid bkag nas go bar byed pa de bzhin du mi rtag pas byas pa la khyab pa nyid kyis kyang ma byas pa bkag nas go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byas pas mi rtag pa la khyab tu zin kyang rtag pa nyid bkag nas go bar byed pa de bzhin du mi rtag pas byas pa la khyab pa nyid kyis kyang ma byas pa bkag nas go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Although the property of the thesis is pervaded by the reason, the understanding is made by negating permanence after the impermanence of the produced is understood. In the same way, the non-production is understood by negating the non-produced after the production is pervaded by the impermanence.

original: de'i phyir mi rtag pa'i don la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa nyid kyis ma byas pa'i go skabs yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pas byas pa la ma byas pa bkag nas go bar bya ba nyid du 'gyur gyi go bar byed pa ni ma
analyzed: de'i phyir mi rtag pa'i don la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa nyid kyis ma byas pa'i go skabs yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pas byas pa la ma byas pa bkag nas go bar bya ba nyid du 'gyur gyi go bar byed pa ni ma
translated: Therefore, since the meaning of impermanent is pervaded by being produced, there is no opportunity for non-produced. Thus, impermanent is understood by the exclusion of non-produced, but it is not the expresser of that.

original: yin no // yang brjod pa /
analyzed: yin no // yang brjod pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: byas pa nyid kyis 'jig pa la //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyis 'jig pa la //
translated: Because being produced is pervaded by destruction,

original: khyab kyis ma byas pa yis min //
analyzed: khyab kyis ma byas pa yis min //
translated: it is not by non-produced.

original: rtag pa med la khyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtag pa med la khyab pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is pervaded by non-permanent,

original: ma khyab pa yi don gyis ston //üîΩrva can nyid kyis ba lang la //
analyzed: ma khyab pa yi don gyis ston // rva can nyid kyis ba lang la //
translated: it is taught by the meaning of non-pervasion.üîΩBecause of having horns,üîΩa cow is pervaded by having horns, but not by non-having horns.

original: khyab par rva can min pa bzlog / glang la rva can gyis khyab bzhin //
analyzed: khyab par rva can min pa bzlog / glang la rva can gyis khyab bzhin //
translated: Just as having horns pervades a cow,

original: ba lang gi don zlog byed min //
analyzed: ba lang gi don zlog byed min //
translated: it is not the negator of the meaning of cow.

original: zhes bya bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses of the chapter.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nges par bstan to //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nges par bstan to //
translated: The demonstration of inference for oneself is finished.

original: rtsod pa sgrub pa nas ni med na mi 'byung ba'i don mthong ba de rigs pa rjes su dpag pa'o zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rtsod pa sgrub pa nas ni med na mi 'byung ba'i don mthong ba de rigs pa rjes su dpag pa'o zhes brjod do //
translated: The proof of the dispute is as follows: When one sees the meaning of the invariable concomitance, that is called inference.

original: de la / med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba'i //
analyzed: de la / med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba'i //
translated: With regard to that, it is said:

original: rang gi rnam pa tsam mthong na //üîΩgal te med na mi 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa tsam mthong na // gal te med na mi 'byung ba'i //
translated: When one sees only the form of the invariable concomitance,üîΩif one says, ‚ÄúI see the invariable concomitance,‚Äù

original: med na mi 'byung ba de 'ba' zhig tsam mthong bar 'dod pa yin na ni de /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba de 'ba' zhig tsam mthong bar 'dod pa yin na ni de /
translated: if one asserts that one sees only the invariable concomitance,

original: rig ces mi brjod /
analyzed: rig ces mi brjod /
translated: then it is not called knowledge.

original: ces bya ba ni 'dir phyis bcug pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'dir phyis bcug pa'o //
translated: This is an interpolation here.

original: ci ste yang de rig ces bya ba 'dis /üîΩgzhan nyid du /
analyzed: ci ste yang de rig ces bya ba 'dis / gzhan nyid du /
translated: But if one says, ‚ÄúI know that,‚Äù

original: brjod na ni lta bur gang la /
analyzed: brjod na ni lta bur gang la /
translated: then it is expressed as different.

original: gal te med na mi 'byung ba'i don gzhan du mthong bar 'dod pa lta na ni /
analyzed: gal te med na mi 'byung ba'i don gzhan du mthong bar 'dod pa lta na ni /
translated: If one asserts that one sees the meaning of the invariable concomitance as different,

original: 'di mthong zhes ji ltar brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'di mthong zhes ji ltar brjod par bya /
translated: then how can one say, ‚ÄúI see that‚Äù?

original: gang la don ni bsgrub bya la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la don ni bsgrub bya la zhe na /
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúThe meaning is the probandum,‚Äù

original: ci ste yang lhag ma don zhes pas bsgrub bya'i skabs su bab pas na don gang bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba de rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste yang lhag ma don zhes pas bsgrub bya'i skabs su bab pas na don gang bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba de rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: but if one asserts that the invariable concomitance is the probandum, then the meaning that is to be established is what is seen, and that is inference.

original: med pa mi 'byung ba nyid rig pa'o zhes 'dod pa yin na ni de lta na /
analyzed: med pa mi 'byung ba nyid rig pa'o zhes 'dod pa yin na ni de lta na /
translated: If you maintain that the nonexistence of smoke is known, then in that case,

original: med na mi 'byung zhes ci dgos //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung zhes ci dgos //
translated: what is the point of saying ‚Äúif it does not exist, it does not occur‚Äù?

original: 'di ltar sngar med na mi 'byung ba smos pas phyis kyang yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngar med na mi 'byung ba smos pas phyis kyang yod pa nyid de /
translated: Thus, since the nonexistence of smoke is mentioned earlier, it exists later.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni don mthong zhes pas rig cing de rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni don mthong zhes pas rig cing de rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nonexistence of smoke is known through the statement ‚Äúif it does not exist, it does not occur,‚Äù and that is inference.

original: dud sogs me sogs la mthong las //
analyzed: dud sogs me sogs la mthong las //
translated: From seeing fire and smoke,

original: gzhan pa'i dpag bya de rig gang /
analyzed: gzhan pa'i dpag bya de rig gang /
translated: how can one know the other object to be inferred?üîΩHow can one say that from seeing smoke and fire, one knows the other object to be inferred, since it does not occur if it does not exist?

original: rjes su dpag @32b pa nyid dper brjod pa'i me la sogs pa la du ba la sogs pa mthong ba las gzhan pa'i dpag par bya ba'i don gang med na mi 'byung bas de rig ces ji ltar rjod par byed /
analyzed: rjes su dpag @32b pa nyid dper brjod pa'i me la sogs pa la du ba la sogs pa mthong ba las gzhan pa'i dpag par bya ba'i don gang med na mi 'byung bas de rig ces ji ltar rjod par byed /
translated: How can one say that one knows the existence of many objects

original: chos don du ma yod pa la //üîΩde rig pa zhes ji ltar brjod //
analyzed: chos don du ma yod pa la // de rig pa zhes ji ltar brjod //
translated: through the knowledge of one object?

original: chos kyi don du ma yod pa la du bas go bar bya ba'i cha ni gang yin /
analyzed: chos kyi don du ma yod pa la du bas go bar bya ba'i cha ni gang yin /
translated: How can one say that one knows the existence of many objects through the knowledge of one object?

original: du ba yang gang gi cha nas gsal bar byed ces ni ma bstan to //
analyzed: du ba yang gang gi cha nas gsal bar byed ces ni ma bstan to //
translated: But it is not shown that smoke is clarified in terms of what part.

original: rigs pa can rnams na re de sngon du song ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rigs pa can rnams na re de sngon du song ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The logicians say that inference is of three types:

original: snga ma dang ldan pa dang / lhag ma dang ldan pa dang / spyir mthong ba can no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang ldan pa dang / lhag ma dang ldan pa dang / spyir mthong ba can no zhes zer ro //
translated: having the prior, having the remainder, and having a general observation.

original: de la re zhig mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not logical that it is preceded by perception,

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: because

original: 'brel pa dbang po'i gzung bya min //
analyzed: 'brel pa dbang po'i gzung bya min //
translated: the connection is not an object of the senses.

original: rtags dang rtags can gyi 'brel pa ni dbang po'i shes pa'i yul yang ma yin la rtags dang rtags can mngon sum pa'ang ma yin na de mngon du song ba can ni rjes su dpag pa'o zhes gang gis 'gyur /
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can gyi 'brel pa ni dbang po'i shes pa'i yul yang ma yin la rtags dang rtags can mngon sum pa'ang ma yin na de mngon du song ba can ni rjes su dpag pa'o zhes gang gis 'gyur /
translated: The connection between the evidence and the property-possessor is not an object of a sense consciousness, and the evidence and the property-possessor are not directly perceived, so how could it be that ‚Äúinference is preceded by that‚Äù?

original: ji ltar na rjod par byed /
analyzed: ji ltar na rjod par byed /
translated: How could it be described?

original: snga ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di la snga ma dang mtshungs pas na snga ma lta bu'o zhes lta bu'i sgrar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: snga ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di la snga ma dang mtshungs pas na snga ma lta bu'o zhes lta bu'i sgrar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: In the phrase ‚Äúhaving the prior,‚Äù the prior is like the prior, so the word ‚Äúlike‚Äù would be used.

original: 'di la snga ma'i chos yod pas na de dang ldan pa'o zhes ldan pa'i sgrar 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'di la snga ma'i chos yod pas na de dang ldan pa'o zhes ldan pa'i sgrar 'gyur grang na /
translated: If you say that the word ‚Äúendowed‚Äù is used because the later entity has the earlier entity,

original: de las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur /
translated: what follows from that?

original: thams cad srid phyir lta bur min //
analyzed: thams cad srid phyir lta bur min //
translated: It is not like the word ‚Äúall,‚Äù because everything is possible.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas 'brel pa 'dzin pa nyams su myong ba bzhin du phyis kyang rtags kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas 'brel pa 'dzin pa nyams su myong ba bzhin du phyis kyang rtags kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba 'dzin par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù means that the later inferential cognition apprehends the object to be inferred through the evidence, just as the experience of the connection between the evidence and the object to be inferred.

original: de'i gcig sngon du song ba lta bu'o zhes ni brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i gcig sngon du song ba lta bu'o zhes ni brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: But it is not to be said that it is like the earlier one.

original: 'brel pa gzhan las kyang 'di sngon ma ltar na zhes 'dzin la /
analyzed: 'brel pa gzhan las kyang 'di sngon ma ltar na zhes 'dzin la /
translated: And it is not to be said that it apprehends the object to be inferred as it was before, through another connection.

original: des ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / ma mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa nyid la lta bu'i sgra sbyar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: des ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / ma mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa nyid la lta bu'i sgra sbyar bar mi bya'o //
translated: And because it does not see that, the word ‚Äúlike‚Äù is not to be applied to the inference of what is not seen.

original: 'khrul ba'i phyir na ldan pa min //
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i phyir na ldan pa min //
translated: It is not endowed, because of error.

original: ldan par byed pa ni rigs na //
analyzed: ldan par byed pa ni rigs na //
translated: If it were the endower,

original: sngar 'di ru yod do zhes 'bras bu snga ma dang ldan par byed na ni yul de shes pa yang snga ma dang ldan par 'gyur la /
analyzed: sngar 'di ru yod do zhes 'bras bu snga ma dang ldan par byed na ni yul de shes pa yang snga ma dang ldan par 'gyur la /
translated: If it is said that the object possesses the prior result, that it existed here previously, then the cognition of that object would also possess the prior result.

original: rgyu la 'bras bu shes par byed pa de ltar ni 'khrul pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu shes par byed pa de ltar ni 'khrul pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: But since that cognition of the result in the cause is mistaken, it is not a valid cognition.

original: rgyu yod na bden du chug na yang gegs srid pa'i phyir dang / rgyu gzhan ma tshogs pa srid pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi 'byung ba srid pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yod na bden du chug na yang gegs srid pa'i phyir dang / rgyu gzhan ma tshogs pa srid pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi 'byung ba srid pa yin no //
translated: Even if it were true that the result exists when the cause exists, it is possible that the result will not occur because it is possible that an obstruction will occur and because it is possible that other causes will not assemble.

original: de ltar na re zhig snga ma dang ldan pa ni rigs pa ma yin @33a * //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig snga ma dang ldan pa ni rigs pa ma yin @33a * //
translated: Thus, it is not logical that the result possesses the prior cause.

original: no ; / lhag ldan la yang lta bur ram //
analyzed: no ; / lhag ldan la yang lta bur ram //
translated: If it is said that the result possesses the remainder of the cause,

original: lhag ma lta bur zhes yang gal te de lta bur byed na ni mngon sum phyi ma dang yul mtshungs pa'i shes pa de yang lhag ma lta bu zhes 'gyur la /
analyzed: lhag ma lta bur zhes yang gal te de lta bur byed na ni mngon sum phyi ma dang yul mtshungs pa'i shes pa de yang lhag ma lta bu zhes 'gyur la /
translated: then if it is said that the result possesses the remainder of the cause in that way, then the subsequent direct perception and the cognition that is similar to the object would also be the remainder of the cause.

original: de yang 'khrul pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'khrul pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: But since that is mistaken, it is not a valid cognition.

original: gzugs mtshungs pa tsam gyis ro mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs mtshungs pa tsam gyis ro mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not certain that a taste is the same as the color.

original: de ltar na lhag ma lta bu'o zhes lta bu'i sgrar yang sbyar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na lhag ma lta bu'o zhes lta bu'i sgrar yang sbyar bar mi bya'o //
translated: So the example is not appropriate.

original: 'brel gzhan las kyang rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'brel gzhan las kyang rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: Nor is it known from another connection.

original: lhag ma dang ldan las 'gyur min //
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan las 'gyur min //
translated: Nor is it known from the possession of a remainder.

original: gang rgyu lhag ma dang ldan pas lhag ma dang ldan pa yin na ni de'i shes pa yang lhag ma dang ldan par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang rgyu lhag ma dang ldan pas lhag ma dang ldan pa yin na ni de'i shes pa yang lhag ma dang ldan par 'gyur la /
translated: If the possession of a remainder is the cause of the knowledge of the remainder, then the knowledge of the remainder would be the possession of a remainder.

original: de ltar yang 'bras bu ma bzung ba med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa bzung nas rgyu rjes su dpog pa med par 'gyur na de yang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang 'bras bu ma bzung ba med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa bzung nas rgyu rjes su dpog pa med par 'gyur na de yang mthong ba yin no //
translated: And so, if the connection is not apprehended without the apprehension of the effect, then the inference of the cause would not occur. But that is seen.

original: de bzhin du byas pa la sogs pa las mi rtag pa la sogs pa rjes su dpog par yang 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa la sogs pa las mi rtag pa la sogs pa rjes su dpog par yang 'gyur ro ;
translated: And in the same way, impermanence, etc., would be inferred from action, etc.

original: / sngar ji lta bar brjod pa'i rjes dpag rnams la yang 'brel pa rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: / sngar ji lta bar brjod pa'i rjes dpag rnams la yang 'brel pa rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: And in the inferences mentioned above, the connection would not be known.

original: 'brel gzhan las kyang rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'brel gzhan las kyang rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: Nor is it known from any other relation.

original: zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: This is what should be said.

original: phyi ma la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi ma la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen later.

original: rgyu nyid la sogs pa'i 'brel pa can gyis 'bras bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye ba rjes su dpog par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid la sogs pa'i 'brel pa can gyis 'bras bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye ba rjes su dpog par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that a cognition having the form of an effect, etc., is inferred from a relation such as causality.

original: 'brel pa can nyid tsam gyi sgo nas rtags dang rtags can gyi shes pa skye ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid thams cad kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa can nyid tsam gyi sgo nas rtags dang rtags can gyi shes pa skye ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid thams cad kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a cognition of the mark and the marked is produced merely through the relation of being a mark, and because cause and effect are apprehended in all aspects and in all ways.

original: de ltar na snga ma dang ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na snga ma dang ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the possession of the prior and the possession of the remainder are not reasonable.

original: phyir mthong ba la'ang de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: phyir mthong ba la'ang de bzhin du'o //
translated: And so it is with seeing the later.

original: de yang rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa nyid las yul la shin tu lkog tu gyur pa las 'jal bar brjod pas na'o //
analyzed: de yang rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa nyid las yul la shin tu lkog tu gyur pa las 'jal bar brjod pas na'o //
translated: And that is said to be the evaluation of a very hidden object from causality itself.

original: rjes dpag gi shes pa thams cad kyi tshad ma'i gzhal bya la /
analyzed: rjes dpag gi shes pa thams cad kyi tshad ma'i gzhal bya la /
translated: The object of evaluation of all inferential cognitions is

original: 'bras bu gzhan ma nyid mi thob //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan ma nyid mi thob //
translated: And the effect would not be obtained.

original: 'bras bu med par tshad mar 'gro ba yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu med par tshad mar 'gro ba yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: And it is not reasonable that a valid cognition should be without an effect.

original: byed pa po dang las kyi bya ba dang 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las kyi bya ba dang 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the activity of the agent and the effect.

original: rtags kyi shes pa tshad ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa tshad ma yin zhe na /
translated: If you say that the cognition of the reason is a valid cognition,

original: 'di snyam du rtags kyi shes pa tshad ma la rjes dpag gi shes pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rtags kyi shes pa tshad ma la rjes dpag gi shes pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o zhe na /
translated: if you think that the cognition of the reason is a valid cognition and the cognition of the consequence is the effect of a valid cognition,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin @33b no ;
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin @33b no ;
translated: that also is not reasonable.

original: / de yang yul tha dad las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / de yang yul tha dad las ni ma yin te /
translated: And that is not from a different object,

original: 'dir yul gzhan la tshad mar 'gyur zhing gzhan la 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes sngar brjod zin to //
analyzed: 'dir yul gzhan la tshad mar 'gyur zhing gzhan la 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes sngar brjod zin to //
translated: because here it is not the case that it is a valid cognition with regard to one object and the effect with regard to another, as was previously stated.

original: rtags kyi shes pa tshad ma yin pa'i lta na ni /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa tshad ma yin pa'i lta na ni /
translated: If the cognition of the reason is a valid cognition,

original: rnam par dbye ba'ang 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba'ang 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: then the classification would not be established.

original: gang rjes su dpag pa ni snga ma ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa'o zhes rtags can gyi dbye bas de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang rjes su dpag pa ni snga ma ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa'o zhes rtags can gyi dbye bas de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the cognition of the reason is a valid cognition, then the establishment of those by the classification of the reasoner as the possession of the former, the possession of the remainder, and so on would not be established.

original: rtags yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is the object.

original: gang yang snga ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dpag pa kho na rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang yang snga ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dpag pa kho na rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: And the restriction that inference is only of three kinds

original: dus gsum la 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i nges par bzung ba de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dus gsum la 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i nges par bzung ba de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: because it holds of the three times is also unreasonable.

original: rjes dpag thams cad dus gsum gyi yul la 'jug ste /
analyzed: rjes dpag thams cad dus gsum gyi yul la 'jug ste /
translated: For all inference holds of objects in the three times,

original: dus gsum pa can no zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus gsum pa can no zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said to be of the three times.

original: de lta bu'o zhes pa'i phyogs la ni 'brel pa bstan pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa gsum ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'o zhes pa'i phyogs la ni 'brel pa bstan pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa gsum ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And in the case of the thesis ‚Äúit is like that,‚Äù there is no demonstration of the relation, so the three modes are unreasonable.

original: de la de lta bu'i rjes dpag kyang bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de la de lta bu'i rjes dpag kyang bkag pa yin no //
translated: And inference of that kind is also refuted.

original: bye brag pa rnams na re 'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dang 'brel pa dang don gcig la 'du ba dang 'gal ba can no zhes bya ba de dag ni rtags las byung ba'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams na re 'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dang 'brel pa dang don gcig la 'du ba dang 'gal ba can no zhes bya ba de dag ni rtags las byung ba'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ikas say: ‚ÄúThis is the result, cause, relation, and identity of that,‚Äù and ‚Äúthese are the conjunctions and disjunctions,‚Äù which are the inferences.

original: de la re zhig sngar /
analyzed: de la re zhig sngar /
translated: In that regard, first:

original: rgyu las 'bras bu grub pa med //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu grub pa med //
translated: The effect is not established from the cause.

original: rigs pa can gyi rjes dpag dgag pa'i skabs su snga ma dang ldan pa dang phyi ma dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba 'di la rgyus 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa'i gtan tshigs med do zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rigs pa can gyi rjes dpag dgag pa'i skabs su snga ma dang ldan pa dang phyi ma dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba 'di la rgyus 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa'i gtan tshigs med do zhes brjod do //
translated: In the context of refuting the reasoning of the logicians, it is said that this ‚Äúhaving the former‚Äù and ‚Äúhaving the latter‚Äù has no reason for inferring an effect from a cause.

original: 'brel pa ni rnam pa gnyis te ldan pa dang 'du ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni rnam pa gnyis te ldan pa dang 'du ba'o //
translated: There are two types of relations: inherence and inherence-cum-contact.

original: de yang me dang du ba dang ba lang dang rva lta bu'o zhes so //
analyzed: de yang me dang du ba dang ba lang dang rva lta bu'o zhes so //
translated: And that is like fire and smoke, and cow and horns.üîΩRegarding that, first:

original: de la re zhig / ldan pa'i rtogs pa grub pa med //
analyzed: de la re zhig / ldan pa'i rtogs pa grub pa med //
translated: The cognition of inherence is not established.

original: ldan pa mngon par ma shes kyang med na mi 'byung ba 'ba' zhig tsam gyi dran pa las kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan pa mngon par ma shes kyang med na mi 'byung ba 'ba' zhig tsam gyi dran pa las kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even without directly perceiving inherence, it is seen from mere recollection of the invariable concomitance.

original: mi rtogs par byed pa la 'brel pa ma bzung na ni gzhal bya gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtogs par byed pa la 'brel pa ma bzung na ni gzhal bya gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: If one does not apprehend the relation in order to make it imperceptible, it is not reasonable as the reason that clarifies the object of comprehension.

original: shes pa'i rgyu nyid las de'i shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i rgyu nyid las de'i shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of cognition, it is the means of knowing that.

original: de la yang ldan pa par gyi me med pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na ni me yang du ba'i shes pa'i rgyur thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la yang ldan pa par gyi me med pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na ni me yang du ba'i shes pa'i rgyur thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the reason for the absence of fire in the interval is the possession of fire, then it follows that fire is the cause of the cognition of smoke.

original: ldan pa ni /üîΩgnyis dang ldan phyir /
analyzed: ldan pa ni / gnyis dang ldan phyir /
translated: For,üîΩbecause of the possession of both.

original: gnyis ka yang gsal bar byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩlcags gong dang sol me'i gnas skabs su dud pa med pa'i me @34a * //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang gsal bar byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro // lcags gong dang sol me'i gnas skabs su dud pa med pa'i me @34a * //
translated: It follows that both are the illuminator.

original: yang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: yang mthong ba yin no //
translated: Fire without smoke is seen in the state of the iron ball and charcoal.

original: gal te dmigs kyis bsal bas gcig ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te dmigs kyis bsal bas gcig ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it is argued that the one is not a reason because of the exception,

original: the tshom can ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes dmigs kyis bsal ba yod pas na de las me'i rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: the tshom can ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes dmigs kyis bsal ba yod pas na de las me'i rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: since there is an exception, ‚Äúdoubt is not a reason,‚Äù then fire would not be the cause of smoke.

original: me du ba dang gdon mi za bar ldan pa ni ma yin zhing /
analyzed: me du ba dang gdon mi za bar ldan pa ni ma yin zhing /
translated: Fire is not necessarily possessed of smoke,

original: du ba ni gdon mi za bar me dang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: du ba ni gdon mi za bar me dang ngo zhe na /
translated: but smoke is necessarily possessed of fire.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: gang gi phyir tha dad min /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad min /
translated: because they are not different.

original: phyir zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: phyir zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is a remainder.

original: ldan pa ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldan pa ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: Possession is not different.

original: de ni gcig la ji ltar ba bzhin du gnyis pa la yang yin pa'i phyir gcig rgyu ma yin par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni gcig la ji ltar ba bzhin du gnyis pa la yang yin pa'i phyir gcig rgyu ma yin par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And since it is just as much the cause of the second as of the first, it is not reasonable to say that it is not the cause of the first.

original: lan cig gi 'brel pa ma zin na ni rgyu 'jal bar byed pa mi 'thad na yang 'di'i 'khrul pa nyid gang las rnam par dpyod /
analyzed: lan cig gi 'brel pa ma zin na ni rgyu 'jal bar byed pa mi 'thad na yang 'di'i 'khrul pa nyid gang las rnam par dpyod /
translated: If the connection between the two is not established in the first case, it is not tenable that the cause is perceived, and how can you determine that there is error in this case?

original: gang med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'i ltar na ni 'dir gnyis ka ni ma yin gyi gdon mi za bar gcig kho na rgyu yin no zhes 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'i ltar na ni 'dir gnyis ka ni ma yin gyi gdon mi za bar gcig kho na rgyu yin no zhes 'thad pa yin no //
translated: If the connection is that one does not occur without the other, then it is reasonable to conclude that one of the two is the cause, but not that both are.

original: me dang ldan pa'i du ba ni //
analyzed: me dang ldan pa'i du ba ni //
translated: Smoke that is associated with fire

original: cha 'ga' zhig las ma yin pas //
analyzed: cha 'ga' zhig las ma yin pas //
translated: is not produced from a part of fire.

original: du ba'i thams cad go byed dam //
analyzed: du ba'i thams cad go byed dam //
translated: Therefore, either all smoke would be the indicator of fire,

original: me yi bsal ba'am go byar 'gyur //
analyzed: me yi bsal ba'am go byar 'gyur //
translated: or fire would not be the indicated object of smoke.

original: ldan pa'i 'brel pa ltar na ni //
analyzed: ldan pa'i 'brel pa ltar na ni //
translated: If the connection were that of association,

original: me'i rno ba dang gsal ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: me'i rno ba dang gsal ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te /
translated: then the distinctions of fire, such as its sharpness, brightness, and so on, would also be apprehended,

original: thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyis ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyis ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be associated with all of them.

original: de bzhin du yang du ba'i rdzas la sogs pa tsam bzung ba'i bdag nyid de nas kyang me rtogs par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang du ba'i rdzas la sogs pa tsam bzung ba'i bdag nyid de nas kyang me rtogs par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, the mere substance of smoke, etc. is grasped, and then fire is inferred.

original: de rdzas la sogs pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de rdzas la sogs pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is not endowed with the entity of substance, etc.

original: ji ltar ldan pa la skyon yod pa /
analyzed: ji ltar ldan pa la skyon yod pa /
translated: As for the fault in endowment,

original: de bzhin du ba la sogs pa'ang /
analyzed: de bzhin du ba la sogs pa'ang /
translated: it is the same for smoke, etc.

original: de la yang ba lang ra can yang ma yin la yang na ser zal la sogs pa'i bye brag kyang rdzas nyid la sogs pa'i spyis go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang ba lang ra can yang ma yin la yang na ser zal la sogs pa'i bye brag kyang rdzas nyid la sogs pa'i spyis go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: There, the cow is not the possessor of the horns, but the horns are the particular of the cow, and the substance, etc. are understood by the universal.

original: de ltar don gcig la 'du ba la 'du ba mi 'thad par brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar don gcig la 'du ba la 'du ba mi 'thad par brjod do //
translated: Thus, the non-feasibility of the assemblage in one object is stated.

original: 'gal ba yang ni srid pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gal ba yang ni srid pa'i phyir //
translated: And because contradiction is possible,

original: ji ltar srid pa ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar srid pa ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: it should be stated as it is possible.

original: gang du mngon du ma gyur pa'i 'byung ba yang rtags dang rtags can du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang du mngon du ma gyur pa'i 'byung ba yang rtags dang rtags can du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Where there is no manifestation, the elements should be stated as the mark and the marked.

original: de bzhin du mngon du gyur pa la yang bye brag dang spyis phan tshun rtags dang rtags can du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon du gyur pa la yang bye brag dang spyis phan tshun rtags dang rtags can du brjod par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, in the case of the manifest, the universal and the particular are to be called the evidence and the evidentive fact, respectively.

original: de cha 'ga' zhig gi sgo nas 'gal ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de cha 'ga' zhig gi sgo nas 'gal ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, they are not contradictory in some respects.

original: yang brjod pa /
analyzed: yang brjod pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: rtags kyi spyi gzhan rtags min @34b zhing ;
analyzed: rtags kyi spyi gzhan rtags min @34b zhing ;
translated: The universal of the evidence is not the evidence for another,

original: / bye brag rnams kyang rtags can min //
analyzed: / bye brag rnams kyang rtags can min //
translated: Nor are the particulars the evidentive fact.

original: gzhan gyi ltar na thams cad nas //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ltar na thams cad nas //
translated: According to the other, everything

original: go bya go byed du yang 'gyur //
analyzed: go bya go byed du yang 'gyur //
translated: Would be both the object and the means of understanding.

original: zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is a summary verse.

original: ldan pa rjes su dpog par byed pa'i rgyu yin na ni dpag par bya ba ldan pa tsam rtogs par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ldan pa rjes su dpog par byed pa'i rgyu yin na ni dpag par bya ba ldan pa tsam rtogs par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the possession of the evidence is the cause of the inference, it follows that one understands merely the possession of the object to be inferred,

original: gzhan du na rtags la rtags can shes pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rtags la rtags can shes pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, otherwise, the evidence would not have the capacity to make the evidentive fact known.

original: de bzhin du 'du ba la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du ba la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, it should be said in the case of the collection, etc.

original: gal te 'dir dud pas me'i yod pa tsam grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'dir dud pas me'i yod pa tsam grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If here the mere existence of fire is established by smoke,

original: de sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not, because it is to be established.

original: gang la dud pa yod pa'i sa phyogs der me dang ldan no zhes bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang la dud pa yod pa'i sa phyogs der me dang ldan no zhes bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: In the place where there is smoke, there is fire.

original: de lta ma yin na 'dir zhes pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'dir zhes pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, the word here would be meaningless.

original: de ltar na mes kyang dud pa'am me'i rno ba la sogs pa la yang zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na mes kyang dud pa'am me'i rno ba la sogs pa la yang zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
translated: In the same way, fire is not necessarily concomitant with smoke, nor is fire necessarily concomitant with the sharpness of a sword, etc.

original: de ltar na ni dam bca' ba'i phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ni dam bca' ba'i phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, one part of the thesis becomes the reason.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar rtags dang rtags can ldan pa las ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar rtags dang rtags can ldan pa las ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not necessarily from the concomitance of the reason and the property to be established,

original: 'on kyang med na mi 'byung ba kho na las so //
analyzed: 'on kyang med na mi 'byung ba kho na las so //
translated: but rather from the mere non-occurrence in the absence of the reason.üîΩLet it depend on place and time.

original: yul dang dus la ltos su chug / de ni yul la ltos kyang med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: yul dang dus la ltos su chug / de ni yul la ltos kyang med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin te /
translated: Even though it depends on place, it is non-occurrence in the absence of the reason.

original: sngar sa phyogs su me med na dud pa mi 'byung bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar sa phyogs su me med na dud pa mi 'byung bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because previously, in a place without fire, smoke was not observed.

original: dus la ltos pa'i phyogs la yang //
analyzed: dus la ltos pa'i phyogs la yang //
translated: In the case of dependence on time,

original: gtsub shing gtsubs pa'i gnas skabs na //
analyzed: gtsub shing gtsubs pa'i gnas skabs na //
translated: in the state of rubbing sticks,

original: ji srid du me med kyi dus de srid du dud pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji srid du me med kyi dus de srid du dud pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because as long as there is no fire, smoke does not occur.

original: de'i phyir dud pas me dpog pa'i rgyur ldan pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dud pas me dpog pa'i rgyur ldan pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, smoke is not a valid reason for inferring fire.

original: 'du ba yang ba lang gi rva yod par dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'du ba yang ba lang gi rva yod par dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the mere conjunction of the two a valid reason for inferring the existence of the cow‚Äôs horn,

original: mngon sum pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not directly perceived.

original: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang /
translated: Even if there were a connection,

original: rgyu ni khong du chud mi 'gyur ;
analyzed: rgyu ni khong du chud mi 'gyur ;
translated: the reason would not be understood.

original: /'brel pa ma dmigs par mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: /'brel pa ma dmigs par mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni mi 'dod do //
translated: It is not accepted that the manifestation of something is due to the non-perception of a connection.

original: 'du ba yod du zin kyang rtogs pa ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid dmigs pa kho na las yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'du ba yod du zin kyang rtogs pa ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid dmigs pa kho na las yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Even if there were a conjunction, the understanding would be only from the perception of the invariable concomitance,

original: de kho na rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de kho na rgyu yin no //
translated: so that alone is the reason.

original: don gcig la 'du ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of conjunction in one object:

original: 'bras bu dang 'bras bu gzhan dang / rgyu dang rgyu gzhan no //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang 'bras bu gzhan dang / rgyu dang rgyu gzhan no //
translated: the effect and another effect, and the cause and another cause.

original: der yang dper na gzugs reg bya lta bu dang lag pa dang / rkang pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: der yang dper na gzugs reg bya lta bu dang lag pa dang / rkang pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, form and the tangible, and the hand and the foot, etc.

original: 'di la yang de nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang de nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same argument applies here.

original: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang rgyur ni khong du chud mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang rgyur ni khong du chud mi 'gyur /
translated: Even if there were a relation, one would not understand that the one is the cause of the other.

original: don gcig la 'du ba ni gang du yang mngon sum du ma gyur to //üîΩdon gcig la 'du @35a * //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba ni gang du yang mngon sum du ma gyur to // don gcig la 'du @35a * //
translated: We have never seen two things that are the same in substance come together.üîΩEven if there were such a thing as two things coming together,

original: ba gnyis yod du zin kyang rtogs pa ni med na mi 'byung ba kho na las mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: ba gnyis yod du zin kyang rtogs pa ni med na mi 'byung ba kho na las mthong ba yin no //
translated: we see that the cognition arises only when the condition is present.

original: 'dir yang gzugs kyis reg bya bzhin //
analyzed: 'dir yang gzugs kyis reg bya bzhin //
translated: Here, as in the case of the tactile sensation and the visual sensation of a patch of blue,

original: reg byas kyang gzugs gsal bar byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: reg byas kyang gzugs gsal bar byed par 'gyur te /
translated: the tactile sensation would make the visual sensation of the blue patch manifest.

original: 'brel pa khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: There is no difference in the relation.

original: don gcig la 'du ba nyid la ni khyad par yod pa ma yin pas gcig las 'khrul par brjod pa bzhin du 'brel pa las kyang rgyu ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba nyid la ni khyad par yod pa ma yin pas gcig las 'khrul par brjod pa bzhin du 'brel pa las kyang rgyu ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Since there is no difference in the coming together of two things that are the same in substance, just as the one is not the cause of the other, so also the relation is not the cause of the cognition.

original: gang don gcig la 'du ba ni gnyis kho na'o zhes brjod pa de la /
analyzed: gang don gcig la 'du ba ni gnyis kho na'o zhes brjod pa de la /
translated: The opponent may say that the coming together of two things is only of two kinds.

original: gzhan yang srid phyir gnyis ma yin //
analyzed: gzhan yang srid phyir gnyis ma yin //
translated: But this is not so, because a third kind is possible.

original: rgyu yang rgyu dang 'bras bu las //
analyzed: rgyu yang rgyu dang 'bras bu las //
translated: The cause is not the effect.

original: 'bras bu'i don gcig la 'du ba'i rtogs pa ni mthong ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i don gcig la 'du ba'i rtogs pa ni mthong ba nyid de /
translated: The cognition of the convergence of the meaning of the effect is seeing.

original: dper na ma gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ma gyur pa las zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na ma gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ma gyur pa las zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying ‚Äúthe mother of a son‚Äù and ‚Äúfrom the mother of a son.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir don gcig la 'du ba ni rnam pa gnyis nyid do zhes nges par bzung ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gcig la 'du ba ni rnam pa gnyis nyid do zhes nges par bzung ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to assert that the convergence of the meaning of the effect is twofold.

original: 'gal ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Inconsistency is of four kinds:üîΩthe inconsistent with direct perception, the inconsistent with inference, the inconsistent with scripture, and the inconsistent with what is commonly acknowledged.

original: mngon sum du gyur pa las ma gyur pa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o zhes pa 'di yang thams cad du /
analyzed: mngon sum du gyur pa las ma gyur pa'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o zhes pa 'di yang thams cad du /
translated: This is also stated everywhere:

original: gang zhig 'gal ba de rtags yin //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gal ba de rtags yin //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever is inconsistent is a reason.‚Äù

original: sprin dang rlung gi sbyor ba dang char 'bab pa ni 'gal la rag na 'dir char 'bab pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin gyi 'on kyang de med pa yin no //
analyzed: sprin dang rlung gi sbyor ba dang char 'bab pa ni 'gal la rag na 'dir char 'bab pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin gyi 'on kyang de med pa yin no //
translated: If the conjunction of clouds and wind and the occurrence of rain were inconsistent, then here the occurrence of rain would not be the reason, but rather its absence.

original: char mi 'bab pa dang sprin dang rlung gi sbyor ba ni 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: char mi 'bab pa dang sprin dang rlung gi sbyor ba ni 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The conjunction of clouds and wind and the non-occurrence of rain are not inconsistent.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: This should be stated in the same way for others as well.

original: gal te rtags ni rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir mngon du ma gyur pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtags ni rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir mngon du ma gyur pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the reason is not the cognition of the non-manifest, etc., because the reason is preceded by the cognition,

original: de ni rtags ma yin te /üîΩ'brel pha med phyir rtags blo min //
analyzed: de ni rtags ma yin te / 'brel pha med phyir rtags blo min //
translated: that is not a reason,

original: rtags kyi blo la ni rtags can dang 'brel pa la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags kyi blo la ni rtags can dang 'brel pa la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because there is no connection. The cognition of the reason is not in the connection.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas na 'brel pa'i don du mdo las 'di ni 'di'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas na 'brel pa'i don du mdo las 'di ni 'di'i zhes smos so //
translated: Because of the absurd consequence, the Sutra says, ‚ÄúThis is of that,‚Äù in order to show the connection.

original: 'di ni rtags nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rtags nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But that is not reasonable as a reason.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rtags las byung ba'i bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtags las byung ba'i bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is taught as a reason.

original: dpag par bya ba'i shes pa yang 'bras bur mi 'gyur zhing rtags brjod pa'i dran pa tsam las kyang khong du chud par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpag par bya ba'i shes pa yang 'bras bur mi 'gyur zhing rtags brjod pa'i dran pa tsam las kyang khong du chud par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of the object to be inferred would not be the result, and it would follow that understanding would occur from the mere memory of the statement of the reason.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba las bstan pas na dran pa la ltos pa'i rtags kyi shes pa nyid kyi rtags las byung ba'o zhes yin gyi de @35b rtags ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba las bstan pas na dran pa la ltos pa'i rtags kyi shes pa nyid kyi rtags las byung ba'o zhes yin gyi de @35b rtags ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is taught that the inferential cognition depends on memory, it arises from the sign that is dependent on memory. It is not a sign.

original: gal te rgyur byas nas rtags su brjod pa ste /
analyzed: gal te rgyur byas nas rtags su brjod pa ste /
translated: If it is said that the sign is stated as the cause,

original: 'di ltar de'i rgyu'i bye brag la rtags kyi sgra mang du byas nas de ltar brjod par bas so zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i rgyu'i bye brag la rtags kyi sgra mang du byas nas de ltar brjod par bas so zhe na /
translated: then it is said that way because the word sign is used in the many specific causes of that.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is also not so.

original: gang gi phyir 'dir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir /
translated: Because here:

original: thams cad rtags su brjod ma yin //
analyzed: thams cad rtags su brjod ma yin //
translated: All are not stated as signs.

original: 'dir byed pa po dang thams cad ni rtags ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir byed pa po dang thams cad ni rtags ma yin te /
translated: Here the agent and all are not signs.

original: 'di ltar rjes su dpag pa ni de brjod pa las kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su dpag pa ni de brjod pa las kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus inference also arises from the statement of that.

original: de lta ma yin na 'dir bdag dang phrad pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'dir bdag dang phrad pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, here the self, contact, and so on would also have to be stated.

original: rtags kyi shes pa rjes dpag gi dngos kyi rgyu ni ma yin te dran pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa rjes dpag gi dngos kyi rgyu ni ma yin te dran pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The actual cause of inferential cognition is not the sign because memory intervenes.

original: des na dngos kyi rgyu nyid du ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na dngos kyi rgyu nyid du ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a real cause.

original: gang yang rtags ni rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir zhes gang brjod pa de la gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang yang rtags ni rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir zhes gang brjod pa de la gang gi phyir /
translated: As for what was said, ‚Äúbecause the reason is preceded by the understanding,‚Äù in response to that, it should be said:

original: dran pa 'brel pa can du 'grub //
analyzed: dran pa 'brel pa can du 'grub //
translated: Because of the establishment of the related memory,

original: 'brel pa can gyi rtogs pas ni grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi rtogs pas ni grub pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not established by the understanding of the related.

original: de skad du yang gang gi phyir //
analyzed: de skad du yang gang gi phyir //
translated: In that case, it should be said:

original: ma grub pa'i rtags ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i rtags ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: because of the establishment of the related memory, the reason is not nonestablished.

original: gal te 'brel pa gcig nyid las rjes dpag gi rgyur 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa gcig nyid las rjes dpag gi rgyur 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúIs it the cause of inference from a single relation?‚Äù

original: de ltar ni bstan bcos nas brjod pa nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar ni bstan bcos nas brjod pa nyid de /
translated: It is stated in the treatise:

original: 'bras bu la sogs mdor ma mtshon //
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs mdor ma mtshon //
translated: The effect and so on are not indicated in brief.

original: gang dag bstan bcos su rgyu nyid dang / 'bras bu nyid dang / rnam par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa dang / de bzhin du yod pa la rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid kyi rtags su brjod kyi /
analyzed: gang dag bstan bcos su rgyu nyid dang / 'bras bu nyid dang / rnam par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa dang / de bzhin du yod pa la rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid kyi rtags su brjod kyi /
translated: Those who say in the treatise, ‚Äúbecause of the nature of cause, effect, and transformation,‚Äù and similarly, ‚Äúbecause of the existence of what is not a cause,‚Äù express impermanence and permanence as reasons.

original: mdor mtshon pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mdor mtshon pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the case.

original: de dag rnams las gang yang rung ba cig 'bras bu la sogs pa srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag rnams las gang yang rung ba cig 'bras bu la sogs pa srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And it is not possible for any of these to be the effect, etc.

original: ji ltar mi srid de 'di gang gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa grub pa de nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mi srid de 'di gang gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa grub pa de nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o zhe na /
translated: How is it not possible? The effect, etc., are established as that which is to be manifested and that which manifests it, and this is the nature of cause and effect.

original: gang 'di ltar gsal bar byed pa tsam rgyur 'dod pa de'i ltar na ni /
analyzed: gang 'di ltar gsal bar byed pa tsam rgyur 'dod pa de'i ltar na ni /
translated: But according to you, who maintain that mere manifestation is the cause,

original: tha ma gsal byed du mi 'gyur //
analyzed: tha ma gsal byed du mi 'gyur //
translated: the last would not be the manifester.

original: rgyu rnams kyi tha ma ldan pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de gsal byed du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi tha ma ldan pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de gsal byed du mi 'gyur te /
translated: The last of the causes, conjunction, etc., would not be the manifester,

original: rgyu las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is different from the cause.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / don med gzhan las kyang de grub //
analyzed: gzhan yang / don med gzhan las kyang de grub //
translated: it is established even without another, which is purposeless.

original: 'brel pa gzhan gyis kyang don khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: 'brel pa gzhan gyis kyang don khong du chud par byed do //
translated: One understands the meaning even through another relation.

original: gang gi phyir 'di 'di'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes yid kyi rnam par shes pas rtogs par byed pa de'i rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu 'di don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di 'di'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes yid kyi rnam par shes pas rtogs par byed pa de'i rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu 'di don med pa nyid do //
translated: Since the mental consciousness understands, ‚ÄúThis is the manifester of that,‚Äù the reason for the inference of this is purposeless.

original: de lta bas na re zhig bye brag pa'i rjes su dpag @36a * //
analyzed: de lta bas na re zhig bye brag pa'i rjes su dpag @36a * //
translated: Therefore, first, the inference of the Vai≈õe·π£ika is not established.üîΩ

original: pa ni sgrub par dka'o //
analyzed: pa ni sgrub par dka'o //
translated: Therefore, first of all, the inference of the Vai≈õe·π£ika is difficult to establish.

original: grangs can pa rnams ni re zhig 'brel ba mngon sum pa gcig las lhag par grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: grangs can pa rnams ni re zhig 'brel ba mngon sum pa gcig las lhag par grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhyas say that inference is the ascertainment of a thing not present to the senses by means of a mark that is related to it in a certain way.

original: de la 'brel ba ni rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: de la 'brel ba ni rnam pa bdun te /
translated: There are seven kinds of relations:

original: de rnams gang yang rung ba'i mngon sum pa gcig gis lhag pa'i don mngon sum pa ma yin pa nges par grub pa'i gtan tshigs de ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gang yang rung ba'i mngon sum pa gcig gis lhag pa'i don mngon sum pa ma yin pa nges par grub pa'i gtan tshigs de ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: When one of these relations is present to the senses, the ascertainment of a thing not present to the senses by means of that mark is inference.

original: rtags kyi shes pa cung zad ma nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa cung zad ma nges par 'gyur te /
translated: The cognition of the mark is not at all uncertain,

original: don ji lta ba ni ma yin no zhes khyad par du bya ba'i phyir phyis kyi rtsom pa 'jug ste /
analyzed: don ji lta ba ni ma yin no zhes khyad par du bya ba'i phyir phyis kyi rtsom pa 'jug ste /
translated: but in order to distinguish it from the cognition of the thing itself, the word ‚Äúinfer‚Äù is used.

original: mngon sum gyi spyi tsam las nges par ma bzung ba'i don gyi bye brag bstan pa las bye brag gi rtogs pa bskyed pa thams cad do zhes so //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi spyi tsam las nges par ma bzung ba'i don gyi bye brag bstan pa las bye brag gi rtogs pa bskyed pa thams cad do zhes so //
translated: All the ascertainment of a particular thing by means of a mark is inference, when the particular thing is not ascertained by mere perception of the universal.

original: de lta bu 'dod pa ltar na yang mngon sum pa gcig las zhes pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu 'dod pa ltar na yang mngon sum pa gcig las zhes pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if one accepts that, it is not logical to say ‚Äúfrom one direct perception.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum ni /
translated: Because direct perception

original: rang don tsam las lta ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang don tsam las lta ba'i phyir //
translated: is for one‚Äôs own purpose alone.

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i spyi dang bye brag gnyis ka la'ang rna ba la sags  pa 'jug pa ni med do //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i spyi dang bye brag gnyis ka la'ang rna ba la sags  pa 'jug pa ni med do //
translated: The ear and so on do not engage both the universal and the particular of a cow and so on.

original: ci ste yang 'dod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'dod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you accept that, it is not so.

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa thams cad ni mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa thams cad ni mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: Because all engagement of the ear and so on is not direct perception.

original: don ji lta ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don ji lta ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the object as it is.

original: de'i phyir de nyid bye brag tu brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid bye brag tu brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, that must be specified.

original: gzhan du tha dad du mi bya ba 'khrul ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan du tha dad du mi bya ba 'khrul ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: Otherwise, it would be like saying ‚Äúwithout error‚Äù and so on, which does not distinguish it from other things.

original: gal te mngon sum gyi 'bras bu la mngon sum zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyi 'bras bu la mngon sum zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: If direct perception is said to be the result of direct perception,

original: 'di ltar mngon sum pa gcig las zhes 'dir mngon sum gyi 'bras bu yin gyi 'jug pa la mngon sum mo zhes brjod pa yin pas na de'i yul yang mngon sum par 'gyur bas na nyes pa med do zhe na de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon sum pa gcig las zhes 'dir mngon sum gyi 'bras bu yin gyi 'jug pa la mngon sum mo zhes brjod pa yin pas na de'i yul yang mngon sum par 'gyur bas na nyes pa med do zhe na de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: In this context, the result of direct perception is called direct perception, but not the engagement. Therefore, its object is also direct perception. There is no fault.üîΩThat is also illogical.

original: mngon sum ni rang don la lta ba'i phyir gal te mngon sum spyi dang bye brag gnyis ka'i yul can du 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: mngon sum ni rang don la lta ba'i phyir gal te mngon sum spyi dang bye brag gnyis ka'i yul can du 'gyur na ni /
translated: If direct perception were the subject of both universals and instances,

original: de lta na yid kyi 'jug pa yang de'i yul can nyid kyi mngon sum du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta na yid kyi 'jug pa yang de'i yul can nyid kyi mngon sum du brjod par bya ste /
translated: then mental engagement would also be called direct perception because it is the subject of those.

original: yul gzhan la tshad ma la //
analyzed: yul gzhan la tshad ma la //
translated: In regard to another object,

original: yul gzhan la 'bras bu 'gyur ba ni med do zhes sngar brjod zin to //
analyzed: yul gzhan la 'bras bu 'gyur ba ni med do zhes sngar brjod zin to //
translated: there is no result. This was stated previously.

original: yul gzhan la mngon sum gyi tha snyad byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gzhan la mngon sum gyi tha snyad byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is illogical to designate another object as direct perception.

original: de nas 'di skad du 'brel ba can mngon sum pa gcig ces pa rnam pa gang gi sgo nas yin zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di skad du 'brel ba can mngon sum pa gcig ces pa rnam pa gang gi sgo nas yin zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, in this context, it should be asked by what aspect the related direct perception is singular.

original: gal te nor nyid la sogs pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te nor nyid la sogs pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is wealth itself, etc., no.

original: de nyid nor can dang 'brel @36b pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid nor can dang 'brel @36b pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is related to the possessor of wealth, etc.

original: nor ni nor bdag dang 'brel ba nyid yod pas so //
analyzed: nor ni nor bdag dang 'brel ba nyid yod pas so //
translated: Wealth is related to the owner of wealth.

original: nor nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su 'byung ba'i dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nor nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su 'byung ba'i dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The memory of wealth, etc., would be meaningless.

original: gal te gzhan no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is different,

original: de ni ma brjod do //
analyzed: de ni ma brjod do //
translated: that is not stated.

original: gal te rtags 'dzin par mtshungs so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtags 'dzin par mtshungs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the same in apprehending the mark,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de ni 'brel ba can nyid du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de ni 'brel ba can nyid du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because it does not apprehend the relation.

original: / rjes su dpag par bya ba la yod pa'i rtags la dud pa la sogs pa nyid du bzung nas phyis de me la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid du dran par byed do //
analyzed: / rjes su dpag par bya ba la yod pa'i rtags la dud pa la sogs pa nyid du bzung nas phyis de me la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid du dran par byed do //
translated: Having apprehended smoke, etc., which is a mark that exists in the inferential object, one later remembers that it is not without fire, etc.

original: ji skad du brjod pa'i nor dang nor can la sogs pa'i 'brel ba gcig las lhag pa grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa'i nor dang nor can la sogs pa'i 'brel ba gcig las lhag pa grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not correct to say that inference is the establishment of a relation of one to the other, such as the relation of wealth to the possessor of wealth, etc., as has been stated.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ma shes par de rtogs phyir //
analyzed: de ma shes par de rtogs phyir //
translated: In order to understand that,

original: nor dang nor can la sogs pa ma shes par med na mi 'byung ba nyid dmigs pa las nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nor dang nor can la sogs pa ma shes par med na mi 'byung ba nyid dmigs pa las nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the observation of the invariable concomitance of the possessor of the property and the property, even without understanding the relation of the possessor of the property and the property,

original: 'brel ba 'dzin pa ni rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel ba 'dzin pa ni rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: the relation is not the cause of inference,

original: shes pa snga ma nyid de'i shes par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: shes pa snga ma nyid de'i shes par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro//
translated: because the previous cognition itself is the cause of the cognition of that.

original: thams cad du nor dang nor can la nges par ltos so zhes pa'i mi 'khrul ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du nor dang nor can la nges par ltos so zhes pa'i mi 'khrul ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And there is no invariable concomitance that the possessor of the property and the property always depend on each other,

original: de'i phyir 'brel ba las rjes su dpogs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel ba las rjes su dpogs so //
translated: therefore it is inferred from the relation.

original: 'brel ba dmigs nas yang mi 'khrul ba nyid la ltos te rjes su dpog pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel ba dmigs nas yang mi 'khrul ba nyid la ltos te rjes su dpog pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to infer from the observation of the relation and again relying on the invariable concomitance,

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would be merely clarifying what is already known.

original: 'brel ba rjes su dpog par byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin na ni de tsam gyi rnam pas rjes su dpag par bya ba shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'brel ba rjes su dpog par byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin na ni de tsam gyi rnam pas rjes su dpag par bya ba shes par 'gyur te /
translated: If the relation were the cause of inference, then the object of inference would be known by that alone,

original: de lta ma yin na rtags la shes par byed pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rtags la shes par byed pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, then the reason would be devoid of the capacity to bring about the cognition.

original: 'dir yang mes dud pa rjes su dpog par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir yang mes dud pa rjes su dpog par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, too, it follows that smoke is inferred from fire,

original: 'brel ba khyad par med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'brel ba khyad par med pa'i phyir //
translated: because there is no difference in the relation.

original: khyad par med pa ni rgyu mtshan can du 'brel bar ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa ni rgyu mtshan can du 'brel bar ro //
translated: The relation is based on the absence of the one in the absence of the other.
