translated: then that is unestablished, because it is one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: dper na mi rtag ste mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes pa @42b bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mi rtag ste mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes pa @42b bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like ‚Äúimpermanent because of being impermanent.‚Äù

original: sgra zhes pa ma grub pa'i don nyid yin pa de bzhin du thams cad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ngo //
analyzed: sgra zhes pa ma grub pa'i don nyid yin pa de bzhin du thams cad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ngo //
translated: Just as the meaning of ‚Äúsound‚Äù is unestablished, so too the reason ‚Äúbecause all do not exist‚Äù is also unestablished.

original: ci ste 'dus pa rnams gzhan gyi don byed de /
analyzed: ci ste 'dus pa rnams gzhan gyi don byed de /
translated: But if you say, ‚ÄúThe collections perform the purpose of others,‚Äù

original: 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du 'dus byas mi rtag ste 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de dag la yang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du 'dus byas mi rtag ste 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de dag la yang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: In these cases, one part of the meaning of the thesis is seen to be the reason.

original: 'dir 'dus pa dang 'dus byas thams cad ni dam bca' ba'i don ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'dus pa dang 'dus byas thams cad ni dam bca' ba'i don ma yin te /
translated: Here, being produced and being the produced are not the meaning of the thesis,

original: dpe med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no example.

original: 'on kyang 'di ltar mig la sogs pa dang / 'dus byas kyi phyogs gcig yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di ltar mig la sogs pa dang / 'dus byas kyi phyogs gcig yin no //
translated: However, it is the eye, etc., and one part of the produced.

original: ci ste yang sgra nyid thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang sgra nyid thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if sound itself is not common?

original: de ltar 'gyur ba'i nus pa ni med do //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba'i nus pa ni med do //
translated: It is not possible for it to be so.

original: dam bca' ba'i don gyi chos ni thun mong ma yin pa ste mnyan par bya ba nyid thun mong ma yin par rigs kyi sgra la ni sgra gzhan med pa'i phyir de lta ma yin pas ma grub pa nyid ces bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don gyi chos ni thun mong ma yin pa ste mnyan par bya ba nyid thun mong ma yin par rigs kyi sgra la ni sgra gzhan med pa'i phyir de lta ma yin pas ma grub pa nyid ces bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no
translated: The meaning of the thesis is not shared, and the object of hearing is not shared, because the word ‚Äútype‚Äù does not have another sound. Since that is not so, it is an error of the reason called ‚Äúunproven.‚Äù

original: // dpe'i skyon yang dam bca' ba'i skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: // dpe'i skyon yang dam bca' ba'i skyon ma yin no //
translated: The error of the example is not an error of the thesis.

original: rtsod pa sgrub par ni 'di 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid kyi khongs su bsdus te /
analyzed: rtsod pa sgrub par ni 'di 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid kyi khongs su bsdus te /
translated: In establishing a dispute, this is included in the category of fallacious reasons that are contradictory.

original: mtshan nyid de lta bu las ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de lta bu las ni //
translated: From a characteristic like that,

original: 'gal ba dang ldan min /
analyzed: 'gal ba dang ldan min /
translated: there is no contradiction.

original: der ni 'gal ba rnam pa gnyis su bstan te /
analyzed: der ni 'gal ba rnam pa gnyis su bstan te /
translated: There are two types of contradiction taught there:

original: dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba dang / grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba dang / grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: contradiction with the meaning of the thesis and contradiction with the philosophical system.

original: de gnyis ka yang 'dir mi srid do //
analyzed: de gnyis ka yang 'dir mi srid do //
translated: Both of those are impossible here.

original: de gnyis ka yang 'gal ba nyid ma yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyis ka yang 'gal ba nyid ma yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //
translated: Both of those are not contradictory, it should be shown.

original: de ltar bsgrub bya bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub bya bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the probandum,

original: da ni gtan tshigs bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gtan tshigs bstan par bya ste /
translated: now the reason should be taught.

original: de la / gang zhig bsgrub bya'i chos kyi rtags //
analyzed: de la / gang zhig bsgrub bya'i chos kyi rtags //
translated: The reason of the probandum

original: de ltar snang ba phal che bas //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba phal che bas //
translated: is the appearance of most of those.

original: des na gtan tshigs sogs don gyi //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs sogs don gyi //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the reason and so on

original: sngon du rgyas par de bstan bya //
analyzed: sngon du rgyas par de bstan bya //
translated: should be explained extensively beforehand.

original: mthun phyogs la yod med rnam gnyis //
analyzed: mthun phyogs la yod med rnam gnyis //
translated: There are two types of existence and nonexistence in the concordant class.

original: phyogs kyi chos la yang rnam gsum //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la yang rnam gsum //
translated: In the property of the subject, there are also three types.

original: mi mthun phyogs la'ang so sor ni //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs la'ang so sor ni //
translated: In the discordant class, there are also

original: yod med gnyis ka'i bye brag phyir //
analyzed: yod med gnyis ka'i bye brag phyir //
translated: the distinctions of both existence and nonexistence.

original: gang gi phyir 'dir phyogs chos rnam pa dgur bstan pa de'i phyir de nyid sngar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir phyogs chos rnam pa dgur bstan pa de'i phyir de nyid sngar brtag par bya'o //
translated: Since here the property of the subject is taught in nine aspects, therefore that should be examined first.

original: re zhig ci ste 'dir phyogs kyi chos su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: re zhig ci ste 'dir phyogs kyi chos su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: First, if it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it the property of the subject here?‚Äù

original: ji ltar ni mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar ni mi 'gyur //
translated: How is it not?

original: gang gi phyir chos can ni grub zin pa'i phyir sgrub par mi 'dod pas na nyes pa med do //üîΩgang @43a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos can ni grub zin pa'i phyir sgrub par mi 'dod pas na nyes pa med do // gang @43a * //
translated: Since the subject is already established, it is not asserted to be established, so there is no fault.üîΩSince the subject is already established,üîΩit is not asserted to be established.

original: gi phyir / bsdus pa bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gi phyir / bsdus pa bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Since the collection is the probandum,

original: chos dang chos can kha yar ba //
analyzed: chos dang chos can kha yar ba //
translated: the subject and the predicate are not the same.

original: dngos su yin yang de phyogs gcig / yin phyir bsgrub byar rtags nas brjod //
analyzed: dngos su yin yang de phyogs gcig / yin phyir bsgrub byar rtags nas brjod //
translated: so it is stated as the probandum by the reason.

original: bsdus pa'i don rjes su dpag par bya ba yin par ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i don rjes su dpag par bya ba yin par ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the summary has already been explained as the inferential object.

original: de dngos kyi bsgrub bya bsdus pa'i yan lag gi don chos tsam dang chos can kha yar ba la ni nye bar btags nas yin par brjod do //
analyzed: de dngos kyi bsgrub bya bsdus pa'i yan lag gi don chos tsam dang chos can kha yar ba la ni nye bar btags nas yin par brjod do //
translated: The meaning of the part that includes the real probandum is stated as the nominal subject and predicate.

original: de'i chos yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de'i chos yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault because it is the property of that.

original: dper na ras yug tshig go zhes bya ba bzhin no //üîΩ'di la yang gnyis ka la grub chos de las //
analyzed: dper na ras yug tshig go zhes bya ba bzhin no // 'di la yang gnyis ka la grub chos de las //
translated: For example, it is like saying the cloth is burned.üîΩHere, the property established for both is

original: tha snyad yin phyir gnyis ka la'am //
analyzed: tha snyad yin phyir gnyis ka la'am //
translated: from that convention, for both

original: gang yang rung ba la bzlog pa'am //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba la bzlog pa'am //
translated: or for either, the reversal

original: the tshom chos grub 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: the tshom chos grub 'dod ma yin //
translated: or the property of doubt is not accepted.

original: 'dir gnyis ka la phyin ci log tu grub pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir gnyis ka la phyin ci log tu grub pa ni /
translated: Here, the establishment of the opposite for both

original: don gyi shugs kyis gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'dod de /
analyzed: don gyi shugs kyis gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'dod de /
translated: is not accepted as the reason by the power of the meaning.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, it is like saying sound is impermanent

original: mig gi gzung bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi gzung bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is apprehended by the eye.

original: gang yang rung ba la ste gcig tu phyin ci log tu yang grub pa ni dper na mngon par gsal bar smra ba la byas pa nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba la ste gcig tu phyin ci log tu yang grub pa ni dper na mngon par gsal bar smra ba la byas pa nyid lta bu'o //
translated: It is established as a fallacy in regard to either one, for example, in regard to the thesis that what is produced is permanent, as stated by the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas.

original: gnyis ka'am gang yang rung ba la the tshom du gyur ba ni dper na dud pa nyid the tshom za ba las me sgrab pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka'am gang yang rung ba la the tshom du gyur ba ni dper na dud pa nyid the tshom za ba las me sgrab pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is established as a fallacy in regard to both, for example, in regard to the thesis that smoke is uncertain as a sign of fire.

original: chos grub pa ni dper na bde ba la sogs pa thams cad yod pa'i phyir bdag khyad par yod do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos grub pa ni dper na bde ba la sogs pa thams cad yod pa'i phyir bdag khyad par yod do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is established as a fallacy in regard to the property to be established, for example, in the thesis ‚ÄúThe self exists because of the existence of all such things as pleasure.‚Äù

original: 'di la'ang phyogs kyi chos nyid du //
analyzed: 'di la'ang phyogs kyi chos nyid du //
translated: In this case, the property of the subject is not accepted

original: mi 'dod thams cad sun 'byin du'ang //
analyzed: mi 'dod thams cad sun 'byin du'ang //
translated: and it is also a refutation of everything.

original: 'di ltar cig shos su gnyis kar rab tu grub na ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar cig shos su gnyis kar rab tu grub na ni /
translated: Thus, if the property of the subject is established for both parties,

original: sun 'byin pa'am grub pa yin //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa'am grub pa yin //
translated: then there is a refutation or an establishment.

original: gang zhig gnyis ka la rab tu grub pa'i phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa ni dper na mig gi gzung bya nyid lta bu ste de ni sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gnyis ka la rab tu grub pa'i phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa ni dper na mig gi gzung bya nyid lta bu ste de ni sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: That which is not the property of the subject that is established for both parties is, for example, the property of being an object of the eye. That is a refutation.

original: sgrub pa ni dper na rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni dper na rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúbecause of the difference of conditions.‚Äù

original: gzhan ni 'di ltar sgrub pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzhan ni 'di ltar sgrub pa ma yin /
translated: But the other is neither an affirmation nor a refutation.

original: sun 'byin pa yang ma yin pas der gang gis rtogs pa bskyed /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa yang ma yin pas der gang gis rtogs pa bskyed /
translated: By what is the understanding generated in that case?

original: gzhan gyis slar yang bsgrubs na 'dod //
analyzed: gzhan gyis slar yang bsgrubs na 'dod //
translated: If the other again affirms,

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid du bsgrubs na de sgrub byed yin zhing ci ste phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa nyid du bsgrubs na de sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid du bsgrubs na de sgrub byed yin zhing ci ste phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa nyid du bsgrubs na de sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: if the property of the position is affirmed, then it is an affirmation. But if the non-property of the position is affirmed, then it is a refutation.

original: phyogs kyi chos kyi sgrub pa nyid ni /üîΩchos can chos can gyis sgrub min //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos kyi sgrub pa nyid ni / chos can chos can gyis sgrub min //
translated: The affirmation of the property of the position is notüîΩthe affirmation of the subject by the subject.

original: chos des chos kyang ma yin gyi //
analyzed: chos des chos kyang ma yin gyi //
translated: Nor is it the property by the property.

original: 'di ltar chos kyi chos sgrub cing //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos kyi chos sgrub cing //
translated: In this way, the property is affirmed by the property.

original: sgrub phyir @43b chos can yang de bzhin //
analyzed: sgrub phyir @43b chos can yang de bzhin //
translated: And because of the affirmation, the subject is also like that.

original: de la re zhig gang dag 'di skad du dud pas me sgrub pa ni chos can gyi chos can sgrub pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de la re zhig gang dag 'di skad du dud pas me sgrub pa ni chos can gyi chos can sgrub pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: In that regard, some say that the affirmation of fire by smoke is the affirmation of the subject by the subject.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not reasonable.

original: de la me'i yod pa rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi 'di la'o zhes rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de la me'i yod pa rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi 'di la'o zhes rjod par byed do //
translated: It is not the existence of fire that is understood, but rather that ‚Äúit exists here.‚Äù

original: gal te der dud pa dang 'brel ba bsgrub byar byed na ni dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te der dud pa dang 'brel ba bsgrub byar byed na ni dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If smoke‚Äôs connection with that is taken as the probandum, then one part of the meaning of the thesis becomes the logical reason.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba du ba la me mthong bar yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba du ba la me mthong bar yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is also not correct to see fire in the smoke that is to be inferred,

original: rjes su dpag pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no inference.

original: de'i phyir 'di la'o zhes gdon mi za bar sa phyogs khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la'o zhes gdon mi za bar sa phyogs khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one must accept that ‚Äúit exists here‚Äù refers to a place,

original: de yang chos can nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang chos can nyid yin no //
translated: and that is the subject.

original: 'dir yon tan dang yon tan can nyid kyi tshul nas chos dang chos can gyi rnam par gzhag pa byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yon tan dang yon tan can nyid kyi tshul nas chos dang chos can gyi rnam par gzhag pa byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the subject and predicate are not posited in the manner of a quality and a qualified.

original: de ltar na re zhig chos can gyi chos can bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig chos can gyi chos can bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Thus, in the first place, the subject is not being proven to be the subject.

original: chos can gyi chos can bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos can bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: One should say that the subject is not being proven to be the subject.

original: de la gang dag mes reg bya sgrub par byed do zhes zer ro //üîΩde ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la gang dag mes reg bya sgrub par byed do zhes zer ro // de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Those who say that the contact of fire and the tangible is established are wrong.

original: 'di la'o zhes brjod pa'i phyir sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di la'o zhes brjod pa'i phyir sngar bzhin no //
translated: Because of the expression ‚Äúin this,‚Äù as before.

original: gal te re zhig rigs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gal te re zhig rigs pa nyid yin te /
translated: If it is reasonable,

original: du ba thams cad la me ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba thams cad la me ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because fire is not seen in all smoke.

original: sa phyogs kyi bsgrub bya nyid yin yang me'i bye brag dro ba bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir sa phyogs brtags pa don med do //
analyzed: sa phyogs kyi bsgrub bya nyid yin yang me'i bye brag dro ba bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir sa phyogs brtags pa don med do //
translated: Even if the object to be established is the place, since the heat, which is a particular of fire, is to be established, it is pointless to imagine the place.

original: dam bca' ba'i phyogs gcig gi gtan tshigs ma yin te /üîΩme'i bye brag bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir dang / spyi gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i phyogs gcig gi gtan tshigs ma yin te / me'i bye brag bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir dang / spyi gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: The reason is not a particular of the thesis,üîΩbecause the particular of fire is to be established and because the universal is the reason.

original: me'i bye brag bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs kyi khyad par byas pa'i du ba'i bsgrub bya nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: me'i bye brag bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba ni sa phyogs kyi khyad par byas pa'i du ba'i bsgrub bya nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: The particular of fire is to be established means that the object to be established is smoke qualified by a particular of the place.

original: der sa phyogs kyi bye brag la ci'i phyir zhe sdang / me'i bye brag la gang gis na ngo srung bar byed /
analyzed: der sa phyogs kyi bye brag la ci'i phyir zhe sdang / me'i bye brag la gang gis na ngo srung bar byed /
translated: Why be angry at a particular place? Why be afraid of a particular fire?

original: gang dag chos kyi chos mi bsgrub cing chos can yang mi sgrub po zhes smra ba ni /
analyzed: gang dag chos kyi chos mi bsgrub cing chos can yang mi sgrub po zhes smra ba ni /
translated: Those who say that the property of the thesis is not established and the locus of the property is not established are like the following example.

original: dper na gtso bo gcig yod de tha dad rnams dang rjes 'gro mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gtso bo gcig yod de tha dad rnams dang rjes 'gro mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, someone says, ‚ÄúThere is one primary nature because of seeing that which is different following.‚Äù

original: der ni tha dad pa nyid rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'di ltar gyo dum la sogs pa rgyu gcig pa nyid du dper brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: der ni tha dad pa nyid rgyu gcig pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'di ltar gyo dum la sogs pa rgyu gcig pa nyid du dper brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: There, the difference is to be proven as having one cause, and the potsherd, etc., are given as an example of having one cause.

original: de'i phyogs chos gzhan nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyogs chos gzhan nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The property of that is to be proven as being another.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩsgrub phyir chos @44a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgrub phyir chos @44a * //
translated: Why?

original: can yang de bzhin //
analyzed: can yang de bzhin //
translated: Because of the proof, the locus of the property is also like that.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan po des khyad par du bya ba'i chos can bsgrub byar bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan po des khyad par du bya ba'i chos can bsgrub byar bstan pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúLike that‚Äù means that the locus of the property is taught to be the probandum, distinguished by that other property.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because that is so, therefore,

original: gtan tshigs kyi chos dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med na mi 'byung bar bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi chos dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med na mi 'byung bar bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: The logical reason and the property to be established are established as not occurring without each other.

original: gzhan gyis sbyor ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyis sbyor ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'i phyir smras pa /
translated: In order to anticipate an objection by another, it is said:

original: dam bca' rtags kyi ngag gis gang //üîΩmi 'dod pa la thal ba rtsom //
analyzed: dam bca' rtags kyi ngag gis gang // mi 'dod pa la thal ba rtsom //
translated: The thesis is the statement of the logical reasonüîΩthat is unacceptable to the opponent.

original: de ni len zhes shes bya ste //
analyzed: de ni len zhes shes bya ste //
translated: That is known as the statement,

original: de yi sgo nas sbyor phyir ro //
analyzed: de yi sgo nas sbyor phyir ro //
translated: because it is the means of engagement.

original: dper na sgra rtag pa ma yin te /üîΩlas rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag pa ma yin te / las rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram /
translated: For example, sound is impermanent,üîΩbecause it follows that it would be permanent action,

original: rtag tu dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag tu dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: or because it follows that it would always be apprehended.

original: phyogs kyi chos de yang gtan tshigs nyid du /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos de yang gtan tshigs nyid du /
translated: That property of the subject is also the logical reason.

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro gang //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro gang //
translated: The logical reason is the invariable concomitance with the probandum,

original: med la med par brjod par bya //
analyzed: med la med par brjod par bya //
translated: which is stated as the absence of the absence.

original: der ni lnga pa'i mtha' can dpe //
analyzed: der ni lnga pa'i mtha' can dpe //
translated: There, the example ends with the fifth case.

original: 'di lta ste dper na sgra mi rtag ste /üîΩbyas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes pa'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na sgra mi rtag ste / byas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes pa'am /
translated: For example, sound is impermanent,üîΩbecause it is produced and impermanent,

original: rtag ste ma byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtag ste ma byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: or because it is permanent and unproduced.

original: 'di la phyogs kyi chos nyid du ni yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di la phyogs kyi chos nyid du ni yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The property of the position is not present in this case,

original: dpe'i mtshan nyid du yod pa ma yin pas na /
analyzed: dpe'i mtshan nyid du yod pa ma yin pas na /
translated: but the characteristic of the example is not present.

original: rtags ni nye bar sbyar las 'dod //
analyzed: rtags ni nye bar sbyar las 'dod //
translated: The reason is accepted from the application.

original: 'dir phyogs kyi chos ni nye bar sbyar ba las bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir phyogs kyi chos ni nye bar sbyar ba las bstan par bya ste /
translated: Here, the property of the position should be shown from the application.

original: de lta bu yang /
analyzed: de lta bu yang /
translated: And that is like this:

original: sgra byas so zhes pa'am ma byas pa ma yin no zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra byas so zhes pa'am ma byas pa ma yin no zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: Either sound is produced or it is not unproduced.

original: gang du bsal 'ongs kyis brjod na /
analyzed: gang du bsal 'ongs kyis brjod na /
translated: If it is said that it is removed,

original: gtan tshigs med par 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: gtan tshigs med par 'gyur ba ni //
translated: then there would be no reason,

original: dpe gnyis las de grub phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe gnyis las de grub phyir ro //
translated: because it is established from the two examples.

original: gang yang bsal te 'ongs pas brjod na ni gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur bas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang bsal te 'ongs pas brjod na ni gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur bas brjod par bya'o //
translated: If it is said that it is removed, then it follows that there would be no reason. Therefore it should be said.

original: de bsal ba las skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bsal ba las skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not produced from the removal of that,

original: rgyu la med pas na tha dad du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu la med pas na tha dad du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it were different from the cause, it would follow that it is separate.

original: de la med pa sngon du song ba can gyi tha dad dmigs par 'gyur na ni rjes su 'gro ba dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la med pa sngon du song ba can gyi tha dad dmigs par 'gyur na ni rjes su 'gro ba dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the observation of difference had non-existence as its antecedent, then the observation of concomitance would not occur.

original: phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that you do not assert that the superimposition is erroneous.

original: 'di ltar gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba gcig sngon du 'gro ba can ni mthong zhing de med pa la ma mthong ba des na gcig sngon du song ba can no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba gcig sngon du 'gro ba can ni mthong zhing de med pa la ma mthong ba des na gcig sngon du song ba can no //
translated: Because you see that the one that is the antecedent is concomitant, and you do not see it in the absence of that. Therefore it has the one as its antecedent.

original: de khas mi len yang rjes su 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de khas mi len yang rjes su 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though you do not assert that, it follows that there is no concomitance.

original: de yang med do zhes bya ba de nyid rjes su 'gro bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang med do zhes bya ba de nyid rjes su 'gro bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: And that is also nonexistent. That is the statement of concomitance.

original: des na rnam ldan las gzhan @44b min //
analyzed: des na rnam ldan las gzhan @44b min //
translated: Therefore it is not different from the one that possesses it.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no concomitance.

original: thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa dang / 'di la khyad par ci yod /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa dang / 'di la khyad par ci yod /
translated: Because of the absurd consequence. What is the difference between this and that?

original: yang 'dir thal ba gzhan brjod pa gtso bor yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang 'dir thal ba gzhan brjod pa gtso bor yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, here the statement of another absurd consequence is not the main point.

original: longs spyod pa po dang longs spyod par bya ba dag yon tan dang yon tan can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa dang / rdzas yod pa ma yin te /üîΩyon tan rnams kyang rdzas su'am //
analyzed: longs spyod pa po dang longs spyod par bya ba dag yon tan dang yon tan can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa dang / rdzas yod pa ma yin te / yon tan rnams kyang rdzas su'am //
translated: Because it would follow that the experiencer and the experienced would be the qualities and the possessor of qualities.üîΩAnd it is not substantially existent,üîΩbecause it would follow that the qualities would be either substantially existent or not substantially existent.

original: rdzas rdzas ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ji ltar bsal te 'ongs pa yin 'di ni bsal te 'ongs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas rdzas ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ji ltar bsal te 'ongs pa yin 'di ni bsal te 'ongs pa ma yin te /
translated: How is that refuted? It is not refuted,

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: because

original: thal 'gyur phyogs chos can min phyir //üîΩkhas blangs sngon du song ba las //
analyzed: thal 'gyur phyogs chos can min phyir // khas blangs sngon du song ba las //
translated: the consequence does not have the property of the position.

original: de bzhin rtags dang dam bca' yi //
analyzed: de bzhin rtags dang dam bca' yi //
translated: The faults of the reason and the thesis

original: skyon brjod sun 'byin du shes bya //
analyzed: skyon brjod sun 'byin du shes bya //
translated: should be understood as refutations that proceedüîΩfrom what is accepted by the opponent.

original: 'dir gtso bo yod pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs yon tan rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa'i phyir 'bras bu gcig pa nyid gtan tshigs su brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir gtso bo yod pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs yon tan rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa'i phyir 'bras bu gcig pa nyid gtan tshigs su brjod do //
translated: Here, because the existence of the primary nature is established by the reason of having the same effect in order to prove that the qualities are concomitant with it, having the same effect is stated as the reason.

original: 'dis khas blangs pa ni gang ma mthong ba'i sngon du song ba'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: 'dis khas blangs pa ni gang ma mthong ba'i sngon du song ba'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: Here, what is accepted is the effect that precedes the nonobservation.

original: de yon tan gyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid bzhin du byas nas longs spyod pa po la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ma nges pa'o //üîΩkhas mi len yang longs spyod bya ba ma yin pa ni yon tan ma yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yon tan gyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid bzhin du byas nas longs spyod pa po la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ma nges pa'o // khas mi len yang longs spyod bya ba ma yin pa ni yon tan ma yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: But if you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.

original: rdzas kyang rdzas nyid du ldan pa las yin zhing de med pa khas blangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyang rdzas nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdzas kyang rdzas nyid du ldan pa las yin zhing de med pa khas blangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyang rdzas nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.

original: ldan pa yod pas na'o zhes ldan pas bsal ba yin te /üîΩldan pa'i 'du ba gcig pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: ldan pa yod pas na'o zhes ldan pas bsal ba yin te / ldan pa'i 'du ba gcig pa'i phyir ram /
translated: If you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.

original: thams cad du song ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du song ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.

original: ci de dag kyang rdzas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci de dag kyang rdzas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.

original: rdzas nyid kyang ldan pa'am ldan pa yang rdzas nyid du khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdzas nyid kyang ldan pa'am ldan pa yang rdzas nyid du khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: If you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject.üîΩIf you say that the qualities are not substantially existent, then it is not established that the reason is a property of the subject

original: rdzas ma yin pa yang rdzas bzhin du rdzas yod par 'gyur ro zhes dam bca' ba'i skyon yin te /
analyzed: rdzas ma yin pa yang rdzas bzhin du rdzas yod par 'gyur ro zhes dam bca' ba'i skyon yin te /
translated: And it would follow that what is not substance would be substantially existent, like substance.

original: rdzas rdzas ma yin pa nyid kyis bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas rdzas ma yin pa nyid kyis bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the fault of your thesis, because substance and non-substance are excluded from each other.

original: ci ste yang yon tan rnams kyang rdzas dang ldan pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba na ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang yon tan rnams kyang rdzas dang ldan pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba na ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is not definite that it follows that qualities are substance because they possess substance,

original: de skad du smra bar mi nus te rdzas nyid dang ldan pa'i gzhan rdzas nyid yin pa ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de skad du smra bar mi nus te rdzas nyid dang ldan pa'i gzhan rdzas nyid yin pa ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then you cannot say that, because we do not see that anything else that possesses substance is substance.

original: de'i phyir nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di dam bca' ba nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di dam bca' ba nyid du rigs so //
translated: Therefore it is logical to say that it follows that they are substance.

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs las yon tan la @45a * //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs las yon tan la @45a * //
translated: From the reason that is the definition of substance, it follows that other things such as qualities

original: sogs pa gzhan rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes thal bar 'gyur grub pas chog go //
analyzed: sogs pa gzhan rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes thal bar 'gyur grub pas chog go //
translated: are also substance. It is sufficient to state the absurd consequence.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid gtan tshigs sam gtan tshigs ltar snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid gtan tshigs sam gtan tshigs ltar snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: The property of the position becomes a reason or a pseudo reason.

original: de dag rnam par phye ba ni mthun phyogs la yod med rnam gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rnam par phye ba ni mthun phyogs la yod med rnam gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The analysis of these is called ‚Äúthe two: presence and absence in the similar class,‚Äù and so forth.

original: de la yod pa grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis phyogs pa dang mthun pa'i phyogs mtshungs pa'i don thams cad phyogs zhes bya ba ste de yang bsgrub bya'i chos so //
analyzed: de la yod pa grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis phyogs pa dang mthun pa'i phyogs mtshungs pa'i don thams cad phyogs zhes bya ba ste de yang bsgrub bya'i chos so //
translated: Regarding that, the establishment of presence is the similar class that is the property of the subject, which is the similar class that is the property of the subject, which is the universal of the predicate of the probandum. All objects that are similar to that are called the similar class, and that is also the predicate of the probandum.

original: tha dad med pa de nyid ces //
analyzed: tha dad med pa de nyid ces //
translated: That itself is called ‚Äúnondifferent.‚Äù

original: byas nas gzhan la ston par byed //
analyzed: byas nas gzhan la ston par byed //
translated: Having done that, it is taught to others.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod ces so //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod ces so //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is present in the similar class‚Äù is said.

original: gal te 'di ltar ;
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar ;
translated: If it is like that,

original: mthun phyogs zhes pa phyogs las te /
analyzed: mthun phyogs zhes pa phyogs las te /
translated: ‚Äúsimilar class‚Äù is from the class.

original: gal te tha dad med pa de nyid la mthun phyogs zhes brjod na ni 'di la yang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o zhes bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te tha dad med pa de nyid la mthun phyogs zhes brjod na ni 'di la yang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o zhes bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: If that itself, which is nondifferent, is called the similar class, then here it is also called ‚Äúin the similar class.‚Äù

original: gal te de ltar 'di la dbye ba ma brjod ce na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'di la dbye ba ma brjod ce na /
translated: If it is said that there is no division like that here,

original: tha dad yod du chug mod /
analyzed: tha dad yod du chug mod /
translated: let there be difference.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la yod pa mi rtag pa nyid ni bsgrub bya ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la yod pa mi rtag pa nyid ni bsgrub bya ma yin te /
translated: Impermanence, which is present in pots and so on, is not the probandum.

original: de'i phyir / 'di la'ang tha dad ces mi 'dod //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'di la'ang tha dad ces mi 'dod //
translated: Therefore, it is not accepted that it is different from that.

original: de'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la yod ces pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la yod ces pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that it exists in the similar class.

original: 'o na mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang yin zhe na rnam pa gzhan du gyur ba nyid ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang yin zhe na rnam pa gzhan du gyur ba nyid ni yod pa yin te /
translated: What is the dissimilar class? The transformation of the aspect exists,

original: bsod nams ma yin pa zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin pa zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: just as it is said that there is demerit.

original: yod pa bkag pa tsam med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa bkag pa tsam med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that nonexistence is the mere negation of existence,üîΩbecause, first,

original: de la re zhig / de gzhan dang ni de 'gal te //
analyzed: de la re zhig / de gzhan dang ni de 'gal te //
translated: it is different from that and it is contradictory.

original: mi mthun phyogs rnams gnyis pa yang //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs rnams gnyis pa yang //
translated: The second is the dissimilar class.

original: rtags med pas ni 'gal ba ste //
analyzed: rtags med pas ni 'gal ba ste //
translated: Because there is no evidence, it is contradictory.

original: rnam par dpyad pa las 'gyur yin /üîΩgal te yang mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa las gzhan te /
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa las 'gyur yin / gal te yang mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa las gzhan te /
translated: It is due to analysis.üîΩIf the dissimilar class exists as different from the similar class, etc.,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa des na gtan tshigs med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa des na gtan tshigs med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the reason would not exist.

original: 'di ltar gang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i byas pa nyid la sogs pa de ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa las gzhan du sdug bsngal la sogs pa la yang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i byas pa nyid la sogs pa de ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa las gzhan du sdug bsngal la sogs pa la yang yod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, that which is the property of the subject, such as being produced, is also present in the other, such as impermanence, in suffering, etc.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'gal ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin mod kyis kyang des gang de la med pa nyid rnam par dpyad nas bsgrub bya go bar byed do //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'gal ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin mod kyis kyang des gang de la med pa nyid rnam par dpyad nas bsgrub bya go bar byed do //
translated: Although the discordant side is the opposite of the concordant side, it is by the exclusion of what is absent there that the probandum is made known.

original: de ltar na yang 'di ni me'i dro ba yod do zhes pas /
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'di ni me'i dro ba yod do zhes pas /
translated: Thus, when it is said that fire has heat,

original: grang reg med par me'i dro ba las go bar byed do //üîΩde ni dro reg ma yin pa la grong reg ma yin pa med pa la @45b yang ma yin no //
analyzed: grang reg med par me'i dro ba las go bar byed do // de ni dro reg ma yin pa la grong reg ma yin pa med pa la @45b yang ma yin no //
translated: the absence of cold is made known by the heat of fire.üîΩBut that is not the absence of the absence of cold.

original: mthun phyogs la med min pa nyid //üîΩmtshan nyid gcig nyid yin mod kyang //
analyzed: mthun phyogs la med min pa nyid // mtshan nyid gcig nyid yin mod kyang //
translated: The absence of the absence of the property of the subjectüîΩis indeed the same as the property of the subject.

original: don du ma la 'jug pa'i rigs //
analyzed: don du ma la 'jug pa'i rigs //
translated: But it is reasonable that it applies to many things.

original: gang 'di ltar mthun pa'i phyogs su med pa mi mthun phyogs la med pa nyid do zhes mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ma yin pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'di ltar mthun pa'i phyogs su med pa mi mthun phyogs la med pa nyid do zhes mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ma yin pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa ste /
translated: That is, the reason is the presence of the property in the similar instances, i.e., the presence of the property in the similar instances is the absence of the property in the dissimilar instances.

original: de gtan tshigs yin pas na byas pa nyid ni /
analyzed: de gtan tshigs yin pas na byas pa nyid ni /
translated: Since this is the reason, the fact of being produced

original: ji ltar mi rtag pa nyid kyi rtags yin pa bzhin du bdag med pa la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mi rtag pa nyid kyi rtags yin pa bzhin du bdag med pa la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: is like the reason for impermanence. It should be applied in the same way to selflessness, etc.

original: 'di ltar de bdag med pa la sogs pa la med pa ma yin pa yang bdag med pa la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de bdag med pa la sogs pa la med pa ma yin pa yang bdag med pa la yod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the fact that the reason is not absent from the similar instances is the presence of the property in the similar instances.

original: ci ste yang 'di ni spyi las the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'di ni spyi las the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you think that doubt arises from a universal,

original: byas pa nyid spyi yin yang rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams la bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du the tshom du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid spyi yin yang rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams la bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du the tshom du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: then the fact of being produced is a universal, but doubt does not arise with regard to permanence, selflessness, etc., as it does with regard to pots, etc.

original: spyi las rjes 'gro blun po min //
analyzed: spyi las rjes 'gro blun po min //
translated: The fool does not doubt what follows from a universal.

original: spyi thams cad the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi thams cad the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Not all universals are causes of doubt.

original: bum pa ni byas pa nyid yin la bum pa ma yin pa la yang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni byas pa nyid yin la bum pa ma yin pa la yang mthong ba yin no //
translated: A pot is a product, and non-pot is also seen.

original: byas pa nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa la yang med par mthong ba ni ma yin te /üîΩthams cad du gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i mi rtag pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs la yod par khas de nyid rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
analyzed: byas pa nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa la yang med par mthong ba ni ma yin te / thams cad du gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i mi rtag pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs la yod par khas de nyid rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
translated: But impermanence, etc. are not seen to be non-existent in a product.üîΩIn all cases, impermanence, which has the characteristics of a reason, is accepted as existing in the subject, such as space, etc.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang yod med gnyis kar ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang yod med gnyis kar ro //
translated: That very [impermanence] is divided into three types: existing in the similar class, not existing in the similar class, and existing and not existing in both the similar and dissimilar classes.

original: de bzhin du mthun phyogs la //
analyzed: de bzhin du mthun phyogs la //
translated: Similarly, in the similar class,

original: de lta ma yin na de gnyis nyid slar bzlas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de gnyis nyid slar bzlas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, those two [reasons] themselves would be repeated.

original: yang de dag re re la yang gsum gsum du dbye bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang de dag re re la yang gsum gsum du dbye bar bya ste /
translated: Moreover, each of those [three types of reasons] should be divided into three.

original: gang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / med pa dang / yod med gnyid kar ro //
analyzed: gang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / med pa dang / yod med gnyid kar ro //
translated: That which exists in the similar class is either existent, non-existent, or both existent and non-existent in the dissimilar class.

original: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang gnyis ka la yang dbye ba de nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang gnyis ka la yang dbye ba de nyid do //
translated: Likewise, the two, nonexistence in the similar class and existence in the dissimilar class, are divided in the same way.

original: gang gi tshe 'di ltar mi rtag pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs la yod par khas mi len pa de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid ces de dang ma 'brel bar ji ltar brjod ce na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ltar mi rtag pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs la yod par khas mi len pa de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid ces de dang ma 'brel bar ji ltar brjod ce na /
translated: When one does not accept that impermanence exists in the class of space, etc., then how can one say that it does not exist in the dissimilar class without being related to it?

original: de'i tshe yang the tshom med pa nyid de de med pa yin pa'i phyir de la 'jug pa med pas skyon de med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang the tshom med pa nyid de de med pa yin pa'i phyir de la 'jug pa med pas skyon de med pa nyid do //
translated: Even then, there is no doubt that it does not exist there, and since it does not engage in it, there is no fault.

original: phyogs kyi chos dgu po de dag gi dper brjod rim pa bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dgu po de dag gi dper brjod rim pa bzhin du bstan par bya ste /
translated: The nine properties of the position will be taught in order with examples.

original: dgu po 'di yang @46a * //
analyzed: dgu po 'di yang @46a * //
translated: These nine

original: mig dgu la rim pa bzhin bris nas phreng gis gyen mthur la mthun phyogs kyi gsum mo //
analyzed: mig dgu la rim pa bzhin bris nas phreng gis gyen mthur la mthun phyogs kyi gsum mo //
translated: are written in order on nine eyes. In a vertical line, the three of the similar class are in order.

original: 'phred la ni mi mthun phyogs kyi gsum mo //
analyzed: 'phred la ni mi mthun phyogs kyi gsum mo //
translated: In a horizontal line, the three of the dissimilar class are in order.

original: phyogs bzhis rang bzhin dang 'bras bu la sogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs bzhis rang bzhin dang 'bras bu la sogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: The four positions should be understood as nature, effect, and so on.

original: sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste /
translated: Sound is permanent.

original: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩmi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro //üîΩmi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro // mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro // mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o //
translated: because they are objects of comprehension.üîΩThey are impermanent because they are produced.üîΩBecause they are impermanent, they arise from effort.

original: byas pa'i phyir rtag pa'o //
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir rtag pa'o //
translated: Because they are produced, they are permanent.

original: rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrtag ste rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir ro // rtag ste rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are permanent because they are audible.üîΩThey are permanent because they arise from effort.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o //
translated: Because they are impermanent, they arise from effort.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
translated: Because they arise from effort, they are impermanent.

original: rtag ste / reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba rnams te /
analyzed: rtag ste / reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba rnams te /
translated: They are permanent because they are not tangible.

original: de dag gi bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
analyzed: de dag gi bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
translated: The summary of these is:

original: gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang // byas dang mnyan bya rtsol las byung //
analyzed: gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang // byas dang mnyan bya rtsol las byung //
translated: The objects of comprehension, the produced, the impermanent, the produced, the audible, and that which arises from effort,

original: mi rtag rtsol byung reg bya min //
analyzed: mi rtag rtsol byung reg bya min //
translated: the impermanent, that which arises from effort, and that which is not tangible,

original: de dgu rtag pa la sogs la'o //
analyzed: de dgu rtag pa la sogs la'o //
translated: are the nine that are permanent and so on.

original: de ltar dbye ba rnams gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang / ma nges pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar dbye ba rnams gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang / ma nges pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
translated: Thus the divisions should be stated as contradictory to the reason and as uncertain.

original: der gang mthun phyogs la yod gnyis //
analyzed: der gang mthun phyogs la yod gnyis //
translated: There, the two that exist in the similar class

original: de med pa la med pa ste //
analyzed: de med pa la med pa ste //
translated: The second is the absence of the reason in the absence of the probandum.

original: de rtags / gnyis kho na gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: de rtags / gnyis kho na gtan tshigs te /
translated: These two are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe first is the presence of the reason in the presence of the probandum.üîΩThe second is the absence of the reason in the absence of the probandum.

original: gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa de bsgrub bya med pa la med pa ste /üîΩgang yang mthun pa'i phyogs la med de //
analyzed: gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa de bsgrub bya med pa la med pa ste / gang yang mthun pa'i phyogs la med de //
translated: The third is the absence of the reason in the presence of the contradictory of the probandum.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.

original: gnyis bsgrub bya med pa la med pa nyid ni dang po dang tha ma gsum pa'o //üîΩdbus na mo'i 'di las bzlog pa ni /
analyzed: gnyis bsgrub bya med pa la med pa nyid ni dang po dang tha ma gsum pa'o // dbus na mo'i 'di las bzlog pa ni /
translated: The first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.

original: 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba ste /
translated: The third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.

original: phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.

original: de lta bu'i 'gal ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gnyis po ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'gal ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gnyis po ni /
translated: The third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ste /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ste /
translated: The third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.üîΩThe second is the logical mark of causality.

original: gnyis pa gsum po'i shar dang / nub na mo'i 'gal ba gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: gnyis pa gsum po'i shar dang / nub na mo'i 'gal ba gzhan yang yod de /
translated: The third is the logical mark of non-apprehension.üîΩThe first and the last are the logical mark of identity.

original: gang bsgrub bya la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang bsgrub bya la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The second is the logical mark of causality.üîΩThe third is the logical mark of non

original: dper na tha dad rnams kyi 'dus pa nyid gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa nyid la 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don sgrub po zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na tha dad rnams kyi 'dus pa nyid gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa nyid la 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don sgrub po zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: For example, the mere assembly of different things is called ‚Äúthe assembly‚Äù because it is the means of accomplishing the purpose of others.

original: de ni du ma'i don sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir rtags gnyis po ni khongs su 'dus pa nyid yin pas na dgu po las phyi rol du gzhan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni du ma'i don sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir rtags gnyis po ni khongs su 'dus pa nyid yin pas na dgu po las phyi rol du gzhan pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the second reason is included in the first, the nine are not external to the two.

original: gzhan rnams ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ma nges pa'o //
translated: The others are indeterminate.

original: lhag ma rnam pa lnga po ni gtan tshigs sam /üîΩ'gal ba nyid du ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma rnam pa lnga po ni gtan tshigs sam / 'gal ba nyid du ma nges pa ste /
translated: The remaining five are indeterminate as to whether they are reasons orüîΩcontradictories.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: They are causes of doubt, that is, they are inconclusive.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad @46b la yang /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad @46b la yang /
translated: All of these reasons, etc.,

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig nyid //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig nyid //
translated: are one in the number that is intended to be expressed.

original: rigs dang rdzas las shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rigs dang rdzas las shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: One should understand them from the class and the substance.

original: gang yang grangs gcig ces pa ni 'dir gang rigs dang mthun par yod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de brjod par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang grangs gcig ces pa ni 'dir gang rigs dang mthun par yod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de brjod par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Also, the word ‚Äúone‚Äù here is to be understood in accordance with what is appropriate.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'gal ba dag la the tshom phyir //
analyzed: 'gal ba dag la the tshom phyir //
translated: Because there is doubt about contradictions.

original: gal te gang phyir 'gal ba mtshan nyid gnyis su brjod pa dag las grangs gcig par ni mthong ba nyid de /
analyzed: gal te gang phyir 'gal ba mtshan nyid gnyis su brjod pa dag las grangs gcig par ni mthong ba nyid de /
translated: If it is said that one sees the number one from two contradictory characteristics,

original: dper na sgra la byas pa nyid dang / mnyan bya dag la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du the tshom za ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na sgra la byas pa nyid dang / mnyan bya dag la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du the tshom za ba yin no zhe na /
translated: for example, one doubts whether sound is produced or not, and whether it is permanent or impermanent.

original: de bzhin the tshom rtags nyid las //
analyzed: de bzhin the tshom rtags nyid las //
translated: Doubt is like that.

original: gcig tu nges par mthong ma yin //üîΩdper na sgra la mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa dang mngon sum pa nyid dag las sgra ni rdzas kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: gcig tu nges par mthong ma yin // dper na sgra la mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa dang mngon sum pa nyid dag las sgra ni rdzas kyang ma yin la /
translated: One does not see a definite one.

original: las kyang ma yin no zhes nges pa yin no //
analyzed: las kyang ma yin no zhes nges pa yin no //
translated: For example, one ascertains that sound is neither substance nor action from the two characteristics of sound, that it is not apprehended by the eye and that it is directly perceptible.

original: de'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa gcig nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa gcig nyid do //
translated: Therefore, there is only one thing that is to be ascertained.

original: gal te 'di ltar brjod par 'dod pa gcig nyid las the tshom dang nges pa gnyis dag tu ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar brjod par 'dod pa gcig nyid las the tshom dang nges pa gnyis dag tu ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhy is it not the case that both doubt and certainty arise from a single desire to speak?‚Äù

original: skyon de ni med de /
analyzed: skyon de ni med de /
translated: That fault does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: mtshan nyid gnyis dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gnyis dang ldan pa ni //
translated: The two characteristics are

original: gnyis gnyis su 'dod re re min //
analyzed: gnyis gnyis su 'dod re re min //
translated: Desired as two, not as one.

original: 'dir ni the tshom dang gtan la dbab pa de gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'thad kyi kha yang du ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni the tshom dang gtan la dbab pa de gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'thad kyi kha yang du ma yin no //
translated: Here, it is tenable that both doubt and certainty have the characteristics of both, but not one.

original: 'dir the tshom gyi mtshan nyid mi zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir the tshom gyi mtshan nyid mi zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Here, if it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is the characteristic of doubt?‚Äù

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can no //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can no //
translated: It is the non-mistakenness of a contradiction.

original: re zhig gcig la ni the tshom gyi mtshan nyid med pa nas the tshom gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'thad pa yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: re zhig gcig la ni the tshom gyi mtshan nyid med pa nas the tshom gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'thad pa yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin no //
translated: First, it is not tenable that one has the characteristic of doubt, and it is not tenable that one has the characteristic of certainty. Therefore, it is one.

original: de lta na ni mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang mngon sum ma yin pa nyid dag dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ji skad brjod pa ltar yin gyi kha yar ba la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang mngon sum ma yin pa nyid dag dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ji skad brjod pa ltar yin gyi kha yar ba la ni ma yin no //
translated: In that case, the definition of a reason would be that it is endowed with the non-apprehension of the object of the eye and with non-perception, and not that it is a property of the subject.

original: gal te 'di ltar 'gal ba med pa re re zhig gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid du rigs kyi /üîΩ'di dper na byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar 'gal ba med pa re re zhig gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid du rigs kyi / 'di dper na byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
translated: If it is reasonable that a reason has only one of these two, without contradiction,üîΩthen, for example, ‚Äúbecause it is produced‚Äù is a reason for impermanence,

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba lta bu du ma las ji ltar nges par skye zhe na ;
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba lta bu du ma las ji ltar nges par skye zhe na ;
translated: and ‚Äúbecause it arises from effort‚Äù is a reason for impermanence. How can it be ascertained from many?

original: du ma yin yang mi 'gal na //
analyzed: du ma yin yang mi 'gal na //
translated: Even if there are many, there is no contradiction.

original: shin tu bar yang gcig la 'jug /'dir ni du ma yin yang don gcig byed pa'i phyir gcig nyid do zhes pa 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: shin tu bar yang gcig la 'jug /'dir ni du ma yin yang don gcig byed pa'i phyir gcig nyid do zhes pa 'gal ba med de /
translated: Even if there are many, there is no contradiction, because they perform a single function.

original: dper na don gcig brjod par 'dod pa po rnams na re 'di la ni kho bo cag gcig pa yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //üîΩgal @47a * //
analyzed: dper na don gcig brjod par 'dod pa po rnams na re 'di la ni kho bo cag gcig pa yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //üîΩgal @47a * //
translated: For example, those who wish to express a single meaning say, ‚ÄúFor us, it is the same.‚ÄùüîΩHere, even if there are many, there is no contradiction, because they perform a single function.üîΩFor example, those who wish to express a single meaning say, ‚ÄúFor us, it is the same.‚Äù

original: te gang du 'di ltar gnyis kyi don du ma byed par gyur pa ni dper na byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
analyzed: te gang du 'di ltar gnyis kyi don du ma byed par gyur pa ni dper na byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
translated: where it is not used for the sake of both. For example, ‚Äúimpermanent because produced.‚Äù

original: sdug bsngal ba'i phyir bdag med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'i phyir bdag med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúimpermanent because produced‚Äù and ‚Äúwithout self because painful.‚Äù

original: de la ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can bzhin the tshom du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de la ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can bzhin the tshom du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In that case, there would be the consequence of doubt, as in the case of the nonerroneous contradictory.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case,

original: de la ni re res kyang don du ma byed pa'i phyir sngar bzhin gcig ma yin pa la 'jug pa shin tu yang rigs so //üîΩgal te gang du 'di ltar bsgrub bya du ma gtan tshigs tha dad kyis sgrub par byed pa ni dper na yan lag las yan lag can gzhan yin te /
analyzed: de la ni re res kyang don du ma byed pa'i phyir sngar bzhin gcig ma yin pa la 'jug pa shin tu yang rigs so // gal te gang du 'di ltar bsgrub bya du ma gtan tshigs tha dad kyis sgrub par byed pa ni dper na yan lag las yan lag can gzhan yin te /
translated: because each of them does not establish the object, and it is quite reasonable that the non-one is engaged as before.

original: the tshom dang gtan la phebs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: the tshom dang gtan la phebs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that in the case of the establishment of many objects of affirmation by different reasons, for example, ‚Äúthe whole is different from the parts because of doubt and ascertainment,‚Äù

original: de la yang phan tshun du brten pa la ltos nas gnyis ka la zhugs pa'i gzhan nyid gtan tshigs gcig pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la yang phan tshun du brten pa la ltos nas gnyis ka la zhugs pa'i gzhan nyid gtan tshigs gcig pa nyid yin no //
translated: then in that case, too, the difference that engages both, in dependence on the mutual dependence, is the same reason.

original: bsdus na ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gnyis ka sgrub pa yin pas na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bsdus na ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gnyis ka sgrub pa yin pas na nyes pa med do //
translated: If it is condensed, then it is both a proof and a definition of a reason, so there is no fault.

original: gal te rnam pa bzhi po the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ni gnyis ka la yod pa'i phyir yin na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa bzhi po the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ni gnyis ka la yod pa'i phyir yin na /
translated: If the four modes are a reason for doubt, it is because they exist in both.

original: 'o na mnyan par bya ba nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mnyan par bya ba nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it to be heard?

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not common.

original: gang thun mong ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang cig shos des tha dad pa'i dngos po thams cad bsus pa'i phyir de la the tshom gyis gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: gang thun mong ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang cig shos des tha dad pa'i dngos po thams cad bsus pa'i phyir de la the tshom gyis gtan tshigs te /
translated: That which is not common is a reason for doubt, because the probandum and the other are included in all things that are different from it.

original: de dang ldan pa des bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa des bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is included in that which possesses it.

original: gang mtha' gcig las kyang ma log pa ste /
analyzed: gang mtha' gcig las kyang ma log pa ste /
translated: That which is not reversed from either extreme,

original: thun mong du rnam par ma bcad pa'i gtan tshigs de ni de dag nyid la'o zhes gnyis ka dang mi 'gal bas na the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid do //
analyzed: thun mong du rnam par ma bcad pa'i gtan tshigs de ni de dag nyid la'o zhes gnyis ka dang mi 'gal bas na the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid do //
translated: the reason that is not distinguished as common, is in those two. Because it is not contradictory with either, it is a reason for doubt.

original: gang 'dir gnyis ka'i cha la nges pa ste gtan tshigs de gzhan las log pa'o zhes pa 'di khyad par ro //
analyzed: gang 'dir gnyis ka'i cha la nges pa ste gtan tshigs de gzhan las log pa'o zhes pa 'di khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is that here there is certainty about both parts, and that reason is the opposite of the other.

original: gal te gang gi tshe sgra rtag par khas len pa de'i tshe 'di gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gang gi tshe sgra rtag par khas len pa de'i tshe 'di gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúWhen one accepts that sound is permanent, then this is a reason,‚Äù

original: gal te 'di la byas pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs su nam yang mi ston na'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di la byas pa'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs su nam yang mi ston na'o //
translated: then if one never presents the reason ‚Äúbecause it is produced‚Äù as impermanent,

original: gnyis ka dmigs pa'i don ltar na ni 'gal ba'i don yin pa'i phyir the tshom gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gnyis ka dmigs pa'i don ltar na ni 'gal ba'i don yin pa'i phyir the tshom gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: then it is a reason for doubt, because it has the meaning of contradiction, like the meaning of the observation of both.

original: 'di yang de nyid nges pa ni rjes su tshol ba po rnams kyi mngon sum dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di yang de nyid nges pa ni rjes su tshol ba po rnams kyi mngon sum dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is also because those who seek certainty have direct perception.

original: 'di'i bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
translated: Here is a summarizing verse:

original: gang dag thun mong min pa dang // spyi dang 'gal ba min 'khrul pa'i //üîΩchos rnams thams cad du de @47b la ;
analyzed: gang dag thun mong min pa dang // spyi dang 'gal ba min 'khrul pa'i // chos rnams thams cad du de @47b la ;
translated: Those that are not shared, not contradictory with the general, and not mistaken,

original: / the tshom bskyed pa'i rtags rnams yin //
analyzed: / the tshom bskyed pa'i rtags rnams yin //
translated: are the reasons that generate doubt about all phenomena.

original: phyogs kyi chos dang ldan gang la //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dang ldan gang la //
translated: The reason is not fallacious when it is endowed with the property of the subject,

original: shes 'dod bzlog pas gnod pa dang // the tshom nyid du gyur las gzhan //
analyzed: shes 'dod bzlog pas gnod pa dang // the tshom nyid du gyur las gzhan //
translated: and when it is the opposite of what is desired to be known, and when it is not contradictory, and when it is not doubtful.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang yod ma yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang yod ma yin //
translated: There is no other reason that appears to be a reason.

original: gal te 'di ltar 'dod pa la gnod pa byed pa'i 'gal ba de bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs so zhes ji ltar brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar 'dod pa la gnod pa byed pa'i 'gal ba de bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs so zhes ji ltar brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the reason is the opposite of what is desired to be known, which is the contradiction that causes harm, how can it be expressed?

original: gal te gzhan ma yin pa'i don byed pa nyid gang yin na gang gi phyir mi 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te gzhan ma yin pa'i don byed pa nyid gang yin na gang gi phyir mi 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: If it is asked why it is not established, it is because the meaning of non-difference is the very function itself.

original: gal te gzhan gyi don byed pa'i gtan tshigs yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi don byed pa'i gtan tshigs yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is said that it is because there is a reason for the function of another,

original: de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go zhes pa la byas pas mi rtag pa 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go zhes pa la byas pas mi rtag pa 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: in the same way, it is said that because it is produced, it is impermanent. The establishment of impermanence is accomplished by production.

original: rtags nyid du sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rtags nyid du sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is to be heard as a reason that proves the very sign.

original: rgal ba 'di ni mi bzad par bkod pa ste /
analyzed: rgal ba 'di ni mi bzad par bkod pa ste /
translated: This objection is set forth without restraint.

original: de la ni rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan pa gcig gzung ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la ni rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan pa gcig gzung ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the reason would not be a probative reason, because it would be the apprehension of something that is not a property of the thesis.

original: gal te 'di ltar gcig po de la bsgrub bya'i bye brag gis gnyis su rtog par byed de /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar gcig po de la bsgrub bya'i bye brag gis gnyis su rtog par byed de /
translated: If one imagines that the one is twofold, by virtue of the distinction between the thesis and the reason,

original: dper na mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang / mngon sum pa nyid bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang / mngon sum pa nyid bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like the fact that it is not an object of the eye and the fact that it is perceptible.

original: de lta na ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can las tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can las tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the contradictory would be different from the nonerroneous.

original: 'di la the tshom ma mthong ngo zhes brtag par mi bya'o //üîΩ'di ltar gzhan gyi don byed pa khyad par can las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir de ni 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom ma mthong ngo zhes brtag par mi bya'o // 'di ltar gzhan gyi don byed pa khyad par can las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir de ni 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: One should not imagine that doubt is not seen in this case.üîΩThus, because it proves the opposite of the special activity for the sake of another, it is contradictory.

original: de ltar na 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa la 'dus pa ma yin pa rnams kyi don byed par sgrub 'dod pa 'di ni gzhan 'dus pa nyid kyi rtags yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa la 'dus pa ma yin pa rnams kyi don byed par sgrub 'dod pa 'di ni gzhan 'dus pa nyid kyi rtags yin no //
translated: Thus, the desire to prove that the noncomposite is active for the sake of another, in the sense of being active for the sake of others, is the reason for the other, i.e., the composite.

original: de'i 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid ni mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid ni mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas grub pa ma yin no //
translated: But the non-existence of the collection is not established by perception or inference.

original: de yod par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its existence is not established.

original: 'di ni the tshom ma yin te khyad par can bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs 'di nyid kyis gzhan 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can nyid las tha dad du phye ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni the tshom ma yin te khyad par can bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs 'di nyid kyis gzhan 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can nyid las tha dad du phye ba yin no //
translated: This is not doubt, but a separate type of reason, the contradictory, which is distinguished by the fact that it is non-erroneous with regard to something else.

original: de bzhin du mthong ba la gnod pa ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag phyin ci log tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal bar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mthong ba la gnod pa ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag phyin ci log tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal bar brjod par bya ste /
translated: Similarly, the contradictory should be stated when the specific property of the subject is established in a way that is contrary to perception,
