original: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir skra ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / mnyan bya ma yin zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir skra ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / mnyan bya ma yin zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: as in the case of ‚ÄúIt is not hair because it arises from effort‚Äù and ‚ÄúIt is not audible.‚Äù

original: gnyis ka bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ni chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ni chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When both are the probandum, the subject is the probandum because it is qualified by the property.üîΩIn that case, either one or both

original: de la gang yang rung ba gcig gam gnyis ka yang rung ste /
analyzed: de la gang yang rung ba gcig gam gnyis ka yang rung ste /
translated: of the two

original: rang gi ngo bo @48a * //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo @48a * //
translated: is the probandum.

original: bye brag las phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bye brag las phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid rigs pa yin no //
translated: Because of the establishment of the opposite of the effect, it is logical that there is contradiction.

original: gnyis ka'i dper brjod bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dper brjod bstan par bya ste /
translated: The example of both should be taught.

original: smra ba thams cad brdzun gyi don can te /
analyzed: smra ba thams cad brdzun gyi don can te /
translated: All speech has a false meaning,

original: mtshon byed yin pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi bya ba'i rnam par rig byed bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mtshon byed yin pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi bya ba'i rnam par rig byed bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: because it is an indicator, like the expression of an action in a dream.

original: gang de bzhin du smra ba yod na ni smra ba dang smra ba'i bdag nyid yin pa brdzun gyi don can nyid yin pas na spyir bsdoms pa'i don la skur pa btab pa yin no //
analyzed: gang de bzhin du smra ba yod na ni smra ba dang smra ba'i bdag nyid yin pa brdzun gyi don can nyid yin pas na spyir bsdoms pa'i don la skur pa btab pa yin no //
translated: If someone speaks in that way, then because the speech and the nature of the speech have a false meaning, the general meaning is denied.

original: des na de'i rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i rang gi ngo bo dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it contradicts its own nature.

original: gal te smra ba nyid brdzun gyi don can ma yin na ni de'i bye brag dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te smra ba nyid brdzun gyi don can ma yin na ni de'i bye brag dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: If speech itself does not have a false meaning, then it contradicts its particularity.

original: yang brjod pa /üîΩchos dang chos can rang ngo'am //
analyzed: yang brjod pa / chos dang chos can rang ngo'am //
translated: Again it is said:üîΩWhether it is the nature of the property or

original: de yi bye brag yin yang rung //
analyzed: de yi bye brag yin yang rung //
translated: its particularity,

original: phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: because of the establishment of the opposite,

original: de la gnod pas 'gal ba yin //
analyzed: de la gnod pas 'gal ba yin //
translated: it is contradicted by that harm.

original: gang du slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: gang du slob dpon gyis /
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] said:

original: nang la 'dus bsags nyid ma yin //
analyzed: nang la 'dus bsags nyid ma yin //
translated: It is not an internal collection.

original: de bzhin gzhan don can ma yin //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan don can ma yin //
translated: It is not for the sake of others.

original: zhes dogs pa bsu ste /
analyzed: zhes dogs pa bsu ste /
translated: [DignƒÅga] anticipated this doubt.

original: gsungs pa de la 'dus pa nyid ni mig la sogs pa nang gi nyid dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs su bkod pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bkag pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa de la 'dus pa nyid ni mig la sogs pa nang gi nyid dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs su bkod pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bkag pa ste /
translated: Here, ‚Äúbeing a collection‚Äù is a reason that possesses the characteristics of a reason, but it is refuted as being internal, such as the eyes, and so on.

original: de ltar na ni gnyis ka mthun phyogs la mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de ltar na ni gnyis ka mthun phyogs la mi 'grub bo //
translated: In that case, both [the reason and the predicate] are not established with respect to the concordant example.

original: 'gal zla'i phyogs la ni gzhan thams cad kyi don byed pa nyid du grub pas na 'gal ba snga ma nyid kyi khongs su 'dus so //
analyzed: 'gal zla'i phyogs la ni gzhan thams cad kyi don byed pa nyid du grub pas na 'gal ba snga ma nyid kyi khongs su 'dus so //
translated: With respect to the discordant example, since it is established as being for the sake of all others, it is included within the previous contradiction.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir de dag nyid du don gzhan gyi sgo nas brjod pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir de dag nyid du don gzhan gyi sgo nas brjod pa /
translated: In order to clarify that very point, he states it in terms of another meaning in just those [verses]:

original: thun mong dang ni khyad par gyi //
analyzed: thun mong dang ni khyad par gyi //
translated: With respect to general and specific

original: chos dang bsgrub bya la gnyis so //
analyzed: chos dang bsgrub bya la gnyis so //
translated: properties, there are two with respect to the probandum.

original: gang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi go byed de ni gsum nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi go byed de ni gsum nyid yin te /
translated: That which causes understanding of the property to be proven is just three.

original: spyi dang / khyad par dang / gnyis ka'i cha shas rnams so ;
analyzed: spyi dang / khyad par dang / gnyis ka'i cha shas rnams so ;
translated: general, particular, and both.

original: / rnam pa dgu nyid du phye ba yang gsum po de dag nyid las yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: / rnam pa dgu nyid du phye ba yang gsum po de dag nyid las yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The division into nine should be understood as being from among those three.

original: de la dang po gnyis the tshom //
analyzed: de la dang po gnyis the tshom //
translated: Among them, the first two are doubt.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang rang gi bye brag tha dad pa la spyi dang khyad par gyi chos can gyi mtha' gcig tu the tshom skyed par byed de /
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang rang gi bye brag tha dad pa la spyi dang khyad par gyi chos can gyi mtha' gcig tu the tshom skyed par byed de /
translated: Doubt arises from the general and particular properties of all things, which are different from each other.

original: dper na sgra rtag pa'am mi rtag par grub pa la gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag pa'am mi rtag par grub pa la gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like establishing sound as permanent or impermanent, saying, ‚ÄúBecause it is an object of comprehension,‚Äù or ‚ÄúBecause it is an object of hearing.‚Äù

original: lhag ma ltos nas gsum du phye //
analyzed: lhag ma ltos nas gsum du phye //
translated: The remainder are divided into three in dependence on the other.

original: bsgrub bya la ltos nas gnyis ka'i cha la ni yang dag pa dang / log par rtogs pa dang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid du yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya la ltos nas gnyis ka'i cha la ni yang dag pa dang / log par rtogs pa dang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid du yin no //
translated: In dependence on the probandum, the other two are correct, incorrect, and doubtful reasons.
